 — only verified professionals will be considered

We are a US-based trade compliance company that helps American importers recover overpaid

tariffs and navigate new tariff regulations. Due to a major US Supreme Court ruling today

(February 20, 2026) that struck down billions of dollars in tariffs, we are scaling rapidly to help

Importers recover their money. This is a ground-floor opportunity with a fast-growing company.



What You Will Do:

This is a behind-the-scenes operations role. You will NOT speak to clients or make phone calls.

All work is written/digital.



• Load prospect lists (company names,
s, estimated refund amounts) into cold

sending platforms

• Maintain clean, organized spreadsheets tracking all outreach activity

s to US business owners)

, Clay,

title: Creative Strategist — DTC Wellness Brand (Full-Time)
description:
We're a growing DTC wellness brand looking for a full-time Creative Strategist to lead our ad creative pipeline. You'll research winning ads, build creative briefs, and manage video editors to produce high-performing VSLs, UGCs, and ad creatives for Meta and TikTok.



You're the bridge between strategy and execution - you find what's working, turn it into a brief, and make sure the final output is ready to run.



What You'll Do:

- Research competitors and top-performing ads in the health/wellness space using tools like Gethookd, Meta Ad Library, and TikTok Creative Center

- Identify winning hooks, structures, angles, and emotional triggers worth modeling

- Analyze and break down winning competitor VSLs - identify what makes them work (hooks, story structure, CTAs, pacing)

- Model and write VSL scripts adapted for our product, including scene directions, visual cues, and voiceover copy

- Write multiple hook variations per script for creative testing

- Build creative briefs for video editors including scripts, visual direction, reference videos, and asset lists

- Manage and give feedback to 3+ video editors through revision rounds until final delivery

- Ensure all creatives are compliant with Meta and TikTok ad policies (no direct medical claims)

- Deliver final ad-ready assets to media buyers on a weekly cycle

- Track creative performance and use data to inform future briefs and scripts



Must-Haves:

- 3+ years in performance marketing, creative strategy, or ad production for DTC/e-commerce brands

- Deep understanding of direct-response ads - VSLs, UGCs, advertorials

- Copywriting and scriptwriting skills — ability to model winning ad structures and adapt them for a different product

- Understanding of direct-response frameworks (problem-agitate-solve, story-lead, listicles, etc.)

- Experience managing editors or creative teams

- Excellent written communication for briefs and feedback

- Organized and deadline-driven - comfortable managing multiple projects in Asana

- Available full-time (40 hrs/week)



Nice-to-Haves:

- Experience in health, wellness, or supplement brands

- Familiarity with AI tools (Claude, Kling, Higgsfield) for creative workflows

- Background in UGC scripting and creator management

- Experience with TikTok Shop content

- Portfolio showing ads you've strategized that scaled profitably

title: Trade Data Research Specialist — US Import/Export Records
description:
Job Title: Trade Data Research Specialist — US Import Records



About Us:

We are a US-based trade compliance company that helps American importers recover overpaid

tariffs and stay compliant with changing trade regulations. Following a major Supreme Court

ruling that struck down billions in tariffs, we are building a team to identify and contact importers

who are owed refunds from the US government. This is a ground-floor opportunity with a fast-

growing company.



What You Will Do:

This is a pure research and data role. You will NOT speak to clients or make phone calls. All

work is written/digital.



• Search public US customs databases (Port Examiner, ImportGenius, public bill of lading

records) to identify US companies that import goods

• Record company names, addresses, contact information, products imported, countries of

origin, HTS (tariff) codes, and shipment volumes

• Organize all data in clean, structured Google Sheets following our templates

• Cross-reference company data with LinkedIn and company websites to find decision-maker

names and
 addresses

• Flag high-value targets (companies importing from China, Canada, or Mexico with large

shipment volumes)

• Track and categorize importers by industry, port of entry, import volume, and country of origin

• Daily goal: research and add
qualified companies to the prospect database



Required Skills:

• Strong research skills — you enjoy digging through databases and finding information



• Excellent attention to detail — data must be accurate (company names, HTS codes,

addresses)

• Comfortable with Google Sheets or Excel (sorting, filtering, basic formulas)

• Basic English reading comprehension (you will be reading US business websites and import

records)

• Reliable internet connection and own laptop/computer

• Available to start within 48 hours

• Able to work independently and follow detailed SOPs



Nice to Have (Not Required):

• Experience with lead generation, B2B prospecting, or skip tracing

• Familiarity with LinkedIn Sales Navigator, 
, 
, or ZoomInfo

• Previous experience researching US companies or import/export data

• Any knowledge of HTS codes, customs, or international trade (we will train you if not)



Schedule:

Full-time (40 hours/week). Flexible hours — you can work PH daytime if preferred. What

matters is output, not when you sit at the desk. Daily targets will be set and reviewed.



Compensation:

$400-$500 USD/month starting, based on experience. Performance bonuses for exceeding

daily research targets. This company is growing fast — top performers will be promoted to team

lead roles within 60-90 days as we hire additional researchers.



How to Apply:

Send a message with:

1. A brief description of any research, data entry, or lead generation work you have done before

2. How many hours per day you can start working this week

3. Your experience with Google Sheets (basic, intermediate, or advanced)

4. Write the word "IMPORT" at the top of your application so I know you read this entire posting



?? IMPORTANT: This role requires accuracy over speed. We will give you a short paid

test task before confirming the hire.

title: Senior Mobile App Finisher – React Native + API Integrations
description:
Job Title: Senior Mobile App Finisher – React Native + API Integrations



About the Role

We have a React Native (Expo) mobile app that’s 80–90% complete. The core UI and functionality are already built. We’re looking for a highly experienced developer to take it over the finish line — completing integrations, running thorough testing, and publishing to both iOS and Android stores.



The app is built for small service-based businesses and integrates with payment gateways, accounting systems, and automation workflows.



?



Your Tasks

 • Review and understand the existing codebase

 • Complete API integrations (payments, accounting, notifications)

 • Set up secure OAuth2 flows and webhook handling

 • Connect the app to an existing automation backend (n8n)

 • Conduct end-to-end testing on multiple devices (iOS + Android)

 • Implement final business onboarding/configuration steps

 • Prepare and submit the app to App Store and Google Play, addressing any review feedback



?



Required Skills

 • React Native (Expo) with TypeScript

 • Strong API integration skills (payments, accounting, messaging)

 • Experience with OAuth2, token refresh, and webhook handling

 • App publishing experience for both iOS & Android

 • Familiarity with automation tools like n8n (preferred)

 • Strong debugging, testing, and security practices



?



We Provide

 • Full access to the existing app codebase (GitHub)

 • API keys & sandbox accounts

 • Test data and workflow documentation

 • Detailed list of remaining tasks & priorities



?



Engagement Details

 • Contract: Short-term, project-based (2–6 weeks)

 • Hourly $25-30 USD per hour, depending on speed and skill

 • Payment: Milestone-based (Code Review ? Integrations ? Testing/Launch)

 • Location: Philippines preferred, but must have fluent English and be available during some AU hours



An NDA would need to be signed prior to starting the project. 

?



To Apply



Please send:

 1. Links to live apps you’ve built or launched (with similar integrations)

 2. A short note about your React Native + API experience

 3. Your estimated timeframe to complete and launch the app

 4. Your preferred rate within the stated budget

 — only verified professionals will be considered

title: On-Camera Actress — Simulated Patient for Health & Wellness E-Learning Videos
description:
AccrediPro University is an internationally accredited online certification platform with 5K+ enrolled students. We train health coaches, wellness coaches, and other health professionals through certification courses.

Our courses include interactive case study simulations.



Attention: This will be NOT  a One-Time gig if it goes well. We have 100+ courses. 

Rate to be agreed based on volume



Here's how they work:

? A real, credentialed health professional (the coach) appears on video explaining clinical concepts

? An actress (YOU) plays the role of a simulated patient, presenting symptoms on camera following a script

? The student watches your video, then selects a response

? Based on the student's choice, a different video plays: correct answer ? Video A, wrong answer 1 ? Video B, wrong answer 2 ? Video C, etc.

? Each case study has multiple branching videos that need to be recorded



IMPORTANT: You will be openly presented as an actress. Students know from the start that the patient is played by an actress — there is a welcome video where you introduce yourself and your character. The clinical/educational content is always delivered by real licensed professionals. Your role is purely performative.



WHAT YOU DO:

? Follow a simple, provided script where you describe symptoms, emotions, and situations (e.g. "I've been feeling anxious for weeks", "My hormones feel out of balance", "I lost someone close to me and I can't cope")

? Record multiple video variations per case study (one per branching path)

? Be willing to adapt your look per role: different characters may require different styling, wigs, makeup, wardrobe — you need to be open and flexible about transforming your appearance based on the patient you are playing

? Deliver believable, natural performances — not theatrical, not robotic. You are a patient talking to a coach. It needs to feel real.



WHAT WE PROVIDE:

? Full script with all lines and emotional directions

? Character brief (who you are, what symptoms you present, your emotional state)

? Technical specs for recording



REQUIREMENTS — NON-NEGOTIABLE:

? Female only

? Fluent English — neutral or American accent is a MUST. No heavy regional accent. This is non-negotiable for course quality and audience perception.

? Natural and convincing on camera — you must be able to portray emotions credibly (sadness, frustration, confusion, hope, relief, fear, etc.)

? Willingness to change appearance per role: different makeup, wigs, wardrobe as needed to play different patient characters convincingly

? Professional setup: good lighting, clean background, decent camera/webcam, clear audio

? Ability to follow a script while sounding natural — not reading

? Must provide valid government-issued ID before receiving any script or material



PLUS:

? Western-passing, international, or mestiza look — our audience is primarily Western (US, UK, EU). We need patient characters to feel relatable. Filipina-American, mixed heritage, or cosmopolitan look with good styling is a strong advantage.

? Acting experience or training (theater, film, commercials, YouTube, content creation)

? Own wardrobe variety and basic makeup/styling skills for character transformation

? Own equipment: ring light, good webcam or camera, external microphone



THIS IS NOT:

? Not a voiceover job — you are on camera, face visible at all times

? Not a one-time gig IF IT GOES WELL  — we have 100+ courses, each with multiple case study scenarios and multiple patient characters. If you deliver quality, this becomes ongoing, consistent, well-paid work.

? Not optional quality — poorly acted, poorly lit, or unconvincing videos will not be accepted or paid for



VOLUME & OPPORTUNITY:

We are building an entire interactive case study library across 100+ courses. Each course may have multiple scenarios with different patient characters requiring different looks. This means recurring work, variety, and the chance to play many different roles over time.



INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY & CONFIDENTIALITY:

All video material is proprietary to AccrediPro

? You may NOT share, upload, distribute, or publish any recordings, scripts, or material online or offline

? You may mention on your profile/CV that you worked with AccrediPro University , but you cannot show or share the actual content

? All scripts and raw files must be deleted from your systems after final delivery unless agreed otherwise

? A confidentiality agreement will be required before any material is shared



We work with international legal teams with direct operational capability in the Philippines. Any breach of confidentiality or unauthorized use of proprietary material will result in immediate legal action. Brand and image damages are pursued aggressively. This is not a warning — it is standard practice.



HOW TO APPLY:

Send a message with:

1) A short self-tape (30-60 seconds): introduce yourself in English, then act out a brief emotional scene of your choice (e.g. describe a health concern as if you were a patient speaking to a doctor). This is the single most important part of your application.

2) Your experience (acting, video spokesperson, content creation, or similar)

3) Your equipment setup (camera, lighting, microphone)

4) Your availability and rate expectations



No self-tape = no consideration. We need to see and hear you before anything else.

Serious applicants only.

title: Digital Marketing & Reputation Management Specialist
description:
First Employee | Ground Floor Opportunity | ECD Creative









About This Opportunity



This is not just another job posting. This is an invitation to become the first employee of a luxury interior design firm that is being rebuilt from the ground up—and if you are the right person, this could be the most significant career decision you ever make.



I am Ed Davidson, founder of ECD Creative. Over the past thirty years, I have built multiple businesses from zero to over £80 million in revenue. Along that journey, I employed many talented Filipino professionals who worked with me for years, earned well, bought houses and cars, and genuinely transformed their lives and the lives of their families. I am looking to do the same again—but this time, I am looking for one exceptional person to join me at the very beginning.



The business we are building serves ultra-high-net-worth clients worldwide. Our client list has included royal families in Thailand, Bahrain, and Kuwait; Madonna; Guy Ritchie; Fortnum & Mason; and The Peninsula Hotels. We create bespoke residential and commercial interiors that become cultural legacies, not just decorated rooms. The work is world-class, the clients are extraordinary, and the potential is enormous.



But right now, we are at the beginning. I need someone who understands what that means—someone who sees opportunity where others see risk, someone who is willing to work harder than they have ever worked before because they know the payoff will be worth it.









Why This Role Exists



For the first three to six months, your primary focus will be reputation management and digital presence. This is strategic, high-impact work that will directly determine whether we win or lose major projects worth hundreds of thousands of pounds.



The luxury interior design industry is built on reputation, credibility, and visibility. Potential clients research designers extensively before making contact. They look at social media, read articles, check Google results, and assess whether a designer has the gravitas and expertise to be trusted with multi-million-pound projects.



Your job is to ensure that when someone searches for ECD Creative or Ed Davidson, they find a consistent, compelling, and credible digital presence that positions us as the world-class firm we are. This is not about "likes" or "engagement metrics" for the sake of vanity—this is about building the digital infrastructure that converts high-value leads into paying clients.



After the first three to six months, your role will expand into broader marketing, client relationship management, project coordination, and potentially business development. If you prove yourself exceptional, there will be opportunities for salary increases, bonuses, and eventually equity in the business.









What You Will Do (First 3-6 Months)



Your initial focus will be reputation management and digital presence. Specifically, you will:



Social Media Management:



•

Create and schedule high-quality social media posts for LinkedIn and Instagram that showcase our design work, expertise, and industry knowledge



•

Write compelling captions that reflect our brand voice (sophisticated, knowledgeable, confident but not arrogant)



•

Research and curate relevant content (design trends, luxury lifestyle, architecture, antiques) to position us as thought leaders



•

Engage with relevant accounts, industry influencers, and potential clients in a strategic and professional manner



Content Creation:



•

Write blog posts for the "Insights" section of our website on topics such as luxury interior design trends, antique sourcing, working with UHNW clients, and design philosophy



•

Draft case studies for portfolio projects that tell compelling stories about the work we have done



•

Create content that is optimised for search engines (SEO) while remaining elegant and readable



Media Outreach:



•

Research and compile lists of podcasts, publications, journalists, and industry influencers who cover luxury interior design, architecture, and lifestyle



•

Draft initial outreach
s for me to review and send (you will not be sending cold
s yourself, but you will be preparing them for my approval)



•

Identify opportunities for guest articles, interviews, podcast appearances, and media features



Reputation Monitoring:



•

Set up and monitor Google Alerts for mentions of my name and the business



•

Track online sentiment and flag any issues that require attention



•

Identify opportunities to respond to press mentions, industry discussions, or client testimonials



Backlink Building:



•

Identify legitimate opportunities to build backlinks to our website through guest posts, industry directories, design awards, and editorial features



•

Conduct outreach to relevant websites and publications to secure backlinks that improve our search engine rankings



AI-Assisted Workflow:



•

Use AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude, Jasper, etc.) to accelerate content creation, research, and drafting—but you must be able to edit, refine, and elevate AI-generated content to a professional standard



•

Understand how to prompt AI effectively to get high-quality outputs that match our brand voice









What Happens After the First 3-6 Months



If you excel in the initial phase, your role will expand significantly. You will take on broader responsibilities, including:



•

Managing client communications and project coordination



•

Assisting with business development and lead generation



•

Overseeing marketing campaigns and advertising spend



•

Coordinating with contractors, suppliers, and partners



•

Potentially managing additional tea
mbers as we grow



This is not a static role. If you are ambitious, capable, and driven, you will grow with the business—and your compensation will grow accordingly.









Who You Are



I am looking for someone who is exceptional. Not good. Not "pretty good." Exceptional.



Here is what that means:



You speak, read, and write perfect English.



•

Your written English must be flawless. No grammatical errors, no awkward phrasing, no "close enough" approximations. You must be able to write professional
s, blog posts, and social media captions that sound like they were written by a native English speaker with a university education.



•

Your spoken English must be clear, confident, and articulate. You will be communicating with me daily via Zoom, Slack, or WhatsApp, and I need to be able to understand you perfectly without asking you to repeat yourself.



You are motivated by opportunity, not just salary.



•

The starting salary is 40,000 PHP per month for the first six months. After six months, we will review your performance and increase your salary accordingly. If you hit targets and exceed expectations, there will be bonuses. If you prove yourself indispensable, there will be equity.



•

I am not looking for someone who sees this as "just a job." I am looking for someone who understands that being the first employee of a business that could become worth millions is an opportunity that most people never get.



You have an entrepreneurial attitude and work ethic.



•

You do not need to be told what to do every day. You take initiative, solve problems, and find ways to add value without being micromanaged.



•

You are comfortable with ambiguity. We are building something from scratch, which means there will be days when priorities shift, plans change, and you need to adapt quickly.



•

You are willing to work hard. This is not a 9-to-5 role. There will be weeks when you need to work evenings or weekends to meet deadlines. If you are looking for a comfortable, low-stress job, this is not it.



You are experienced in digital marketing, social media, and content creation.



•

You have at least 2-3 years of experience managing social media accounts, creating content, and running digital marketing campaigns.



•

You understand SEO, backlink building, and how to improve search engine rankings.



•

You know how to use AI tools to accelerate your work, but you also know how to edit and refine AI-generated content to a professional standard.



•

You are familiar with tools like Canva, Hootsuite, Buffer, Google Analytics, and WordPress.



You are detail-oriented and quality-obsessed.



•

You do not send work that has typos, formatting errors, or sloppy mistakes. You proofread everything twice before submitting it.



•

You understand that in the luxury industry, quality matters more than quantity. One excellent blog post is worth ten mediocre ones.



You are honest, reliable, and professional.



•

You show up on time for meetings. You meet deadlines. You communicate clearly when there are problems.



•

You do not make excuses. If you make a mistake, you own it, fix it, and learn from it.









The Selection Process (This Will Be Rigorous)



I am not hiring the first person who applies. I am hiring the best person, even if it takes months to find them.



Here is how the process will work:



Step 1: Initial Application



•

You will submit your CV, a cover letter, and answers to a detailed questionnaire (see below).



•

I will review every application personally. If your English is not perfect, if your answers are generic, or if you clearly have not read this job posting carefully, you will not move forward.



Step 2: Written Assessment



•

If you pass the initial screening, you will be asked to complete a written assessment. This will involve writing a blog post, drafting social media captions, and creating a content strategy for a hypothetical project.



•

This will take 2-3 hours of your time. It is unpaid. If you are not willing to invest that time to prove your abilities, this role is not for you.



Step 3: Video Interview



•

If your written assessment is excellent, we will schedule a video interview via Zoom. I will ask you about your experience, your approach to work, and your long-term goals.



•

I will also assess your spoken English, your professionalism, and whether you are someone I can trust to represent my business.



Step 4: Face-to-Face Interview in Manila



•

I will be flying to Manila in late March or early April 2025 to conduct final interviews in person.



•

If you make it to this stage, we will meet face-to-face, discuss the role in detail, and determine whether we are a good fit for each other.



Step 5: Job Offer



•

If you are selected, you will receive a formal job offer with a clear contract, salary structure, and performance expectations.









Compensation and Benefits



Starting Salary: ?40,000 PHP for the first six months.



After Six Months: Salary review based on performance. If you are meeting or exceeding expectations, your salary will increase significantly.



Bonuses: Performance-based bonuses for hitting key targets (e.g., securing media features, driving website traffic, generating client leads).



Long-Term Potential: If you prove yourself exceptional over the first 12-24 months, there will be opportunities for equity in the business. This means you could own a percentage of a company that could be worth millions.



Work Environment: Fully remote. You can work from home, a co-working space, or anywhere with a reliable internet connection.



Working Hours: Flexible, but you must be available for regular check-ins via Zoom or Slack during UK business hours (GMT/BST). Some evening or weekend work may be required during busy periods.









How to Apply



If you have read this entire job posting and you believe you are the right person for this role, here is what you need to do:



1. Submit your CV (in English, PDF format, no longer than 2 pages).



2. Write a cover letter (
words) that answers the following questions:



•

Why are you interested in this role?



•

What makes you the best candidate for this position?



•

What is the biggest professional achievement you are most proud of, and why?



3. Answer the following questionnaire:









Application Questionnaire



Please answer the following questions in detail. Your answers should be thoughtful, specific, and demonstrate your understanding of the role.



1. English Proficiency Test

Write a 150-word social media caption for LinkedIn that introduces ECD Creative to a luxury interior design audience. The caption should be sophisticated, engaging, and include a call-to-action. (Imagine this is the first post on our new LinkedIn page.)



2. Content Strategy Question

You have been asked to write a blog post titled "The Art of Sourcing Antiques for Luxury Interiors." Outline the structure of the blog post (introduction, key sections, conclusion) and explain what research you would do before writing it.



3. Reputation Management Scenario

You discover that when someone searches for "Ed Davidson" on Google, the first page of results includes an old negative article from 2018 about a business dispute. What steps would you take to push this article down in the search results and replace it with positive content?



4. AI and Workflow Efficiency

Describe how you would use AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude, etc.) to accelerate your work in this role. Give a specific example of a task you would use AI for, and explain how you would ensure the output is high-quality and on-brand.



5. Motivation and Long-Term Goals

Why are you willing to work for £500 per month when you could probably find a higher-paying job elsewhere? What do you see as the long-term opportunity in this role, and how do you plan to make yourself indispensable?



6. Work Ethic and Problem-Solving

Describe a time when you had to work under pressure to meet a tight deadline. What was the situation, what did you do, and what was the outcome?



7. Availability and Commitment

Confirm that you are available to start work immediately (or provide your notice period). Confirm that you are available for a face-to-face interview in Manila in late March or early April 2025.









Final Thoughts



If you have made it this far, thank you for taking the time to read this carefully.



I am not looking for someone who is "looking for a job." I am looking for someone who is looking for an opportunity to build something extraordinary.



If you are that person, I look forward to hearing from you.



Ed Davidson

Founder, ECD Creative

title: Director of Marketing
description:
We’re a fast-growing telehealth company on a mission to help people transform their lives through medically-supervised weight loss solutions. We combine cutting-edge GLP-1 medications with expert care and personalized support—all delivered virtually, directly to the consumer. Now, we’re looking for a strategic and creative Director of Marketing to lead our brand and customer acquisition efforts as we scale.



The Role

As Director of Marketing, you will be responsible for building, managing, and executing a high-impact marketing strategy that drives awareness, conversions, and long-term brand growth. This is a senior-level leadership position that requires deep DTC experience, strong content creation chops, and a proven ability to lead a marketing team from the ground up. You must also have startup experience and the ability to operate at both strategic and tactical levels.



?? This is a full-time leadership role. We are looking for someone fully committed to this mission—no side consultancies or multiple roles.



Key Responsibilities

Lead Marketing Strategy: Build and own our full-funnel marketing strategy with a focus on brand, performance, and retention.



Content Marketing: Drive storytelling and content creation that resonates with our target audience across channels??
, social, blog, landing pages, video, and more.



Team Building & Leadership: Recruit, develop, and lead a high-performing marketing team (designers, content creators, media buyers, etc.) from the ground up.



Startup Agility: Operate with a founder’s mindset—scrappy, resourceful, and solutions-driven in a fast-paced environment.



Performance Marketing: Oversee paid media campaigns across
, Instagram, TikTok, Google, and more. Analyze performance and optimize spend.



Brand Leadership: Shape the voice, tone, and aesthetic of the brand to create emotional connection and trust with our audience.



Cross-functional Collaboration: Partner with Product, Medical, and Operations to ensure aligned messaging, successful launches, and customer satisfaction.



 & Lifecycle Marketing: Create and manage segmented campaigns to nurture leads and increase LTV.



Copywriting Excellence: Write and review compelling copy that sells while staying true to our voice and mission.



Requirements

6+ years of marketing experience, with at least 3 years in a senior DTC role.



Must have experience building and leading marketing teams from scratch.



Previous startup experience is a must—ideally leading marketing through a phase of rapid growth or launch.



Strong direct-to-consumer marketing expertise—especially in health, wellness, beauty, or e-commerce.



Excellent copywriting and content creation skills.



Must be fully committed to this role—no agency work, side hustles, or multiple company engagements.



Hands-on experience with paid media, CRM platforms, lifecycle marketing, and performance analytics.



Creative, analytical, and passionate about health, tech, and changing lives.



Why Join Us

A mission-driven company in hypergrowth mode



High-impact role with full ownership of marketing



Competitive salary, performance-based bonuses, and equity opportunities



Work with a team that values creativity, autonomy, and results



Remote-first culture with flexible work hours

title: Digital Marketing & Brand Growth Manager — First Employee at Exciting London Luxury Startup
description:
OB DESCRIPTION



About Us



Source Me It is a new London-based luxury sourcing company that connects high-net-worth clients, interior designers, and collectors worldwide with rare and extraordinary antiques, art, furniture, and decorative objects. We source from hidden markets, private collections, and trusted dealers across Europe and beyond — items that cannot be found online.



Our founder, Ed, has over 30 years of experience in the luxury, creative, and antiques industries. He started his career at Christie's auction house at the age of 16, went on to work with some of the world's most recognised brands, hotels, and private clients across five continents, and previously built a company from zero to over £80 million in annual turnover — a company where many of the Filipino tea
mbers were able to buy their own homes, cars, and genuinely transform their lives through hard work and shared success.



That company was in a different industry, but the principles are the same: find exceptional people, treat them well, give them real responsibility, and grow together. Source Me It is the next chapter, and we are looking for our first employee — someone who wants to be there from day one and grow with us.



We also have a sister company, ECD Creative, a luxury interior design and creative consultancy based in New York and London. The right candidate may also support this brand as we grow.



Why This Role Is Special



This is not a typical VA position. You will not be doing data entry or answering phones. You are being hired as the first tea
mber of a company that has genuine potential to become a significant global brand. The founder has done it before and knows exactly what it takes.



What that means for you:



•

You will have real responsibility from day one. Not busywork — meaningful work that directly impacts the company's growth.



•

You will learn how to build a luxury brand from scratch. The founder will mentor you directly.



•

Your growth is tied to the company's growth. After the initial 6-month period, performance bonuses will be introduced. For the right person who proves themselves exceptional, there is genuine potential for equity participation in the business — meaning you could own a piece of what we build together.



•

The founder has a track record of enriching the lives of Filipino tea
mbers. This is not a promise made lightly. In his previous company, Filipino staff members who started at entry level went on to buy homes and cars. The same opportunity exists here for someone with the right attitude.



What You Will Be Doing



Digital Marketing & Content Creation (Primary Focus — First 3 Months)



•

Research, write, and publish blog posts and articles for the Source Me It website (and later ECD Creative) — topics include antiques, interior design, luxury markets, collecting, and European culture



•

Create, schedule, and manage all social media content across Instagram, LinkedIn,
, Pinterest, and TikTok



•

Build and grow our LinkedIn presence — connect with interior designers, architects, collectors, and luxury professionals worldwide



•

Write and send
 newsletters to our growing subscriber list



•

Create engaging captions, hashtags, and visual content strategies tailored to a luxury audience



•

Monitor social media engagement and respond to comments and messages professionally



Online Reputation & Brand Building



•

Research and implement SEO strategies to improve our search engine rankings



•

Write and publish thought-leadership content that positions the company as an authority



•

Identify and pitch guest blog opportunities, press features, and PR placements



•

Monitor online mentions and manage the company's digital reputation



•

Set up and manage Google Alerts and social listening tools



AI & Technology



•

Use AI tools (ChatGPT, Manus, Canva AI, etc.) to accelerate content creation, research, and workflow



•

Stay current with new AI tools and suggest ways to improve our efficiency



•

Help manage and update our website content



•

Assist with CRM and client database management



Operations Support (As We Grow)



•

Help coordinate sourcing requests between clients and suppliers



•

Assist with preparing client proposals and presentations



•

Support with research on specific antiques, artists, periods, and markets



•

Help manage supplier relationships and communications









REQUIRED SKILLS (Hard Skills)



You must have demonstrable experience in:



•

Excellent written English — native-level grammar, spelling, and ability to write in a sophisticated, professional tone suitable for a luxury brand. This is non-negotiable. You will be writing content that high-net-worth clients and top interior designers will read.



•

Social media management — proven experience managing business accounts on Instagram, LinkedIn,
, and Pinterest. You should understand algorithms, engagement strategies, and content calendars.



•

Content writing / blogging — ability to research topics and write long-form articles (1,000–2,000 words) that are informative, engaging, and SEO-optimised.



•

Basic graphic design — comfortable using Canva or similar tools to create social media graphics, presentations, and simple marketing materials.



•

SEO fundamentals — understanding of on-page SEO, keyword research, meta descriptions, and how to write content that ranks.



•

AI proficiency — experience using AI tools for content creation, research, or workflow automation. You should be comfortable learning new tools quickly.



•

 marketing — experience with
 platforms (Mailchimp, Resend, or similar) to create and send professional newsletters.









REQUIRED QUALITIES (Soft Skills)



Equally important to your technical skills:



•

Entrepreneurial mindset — you think like a business owner, not an employee. You see problems and fix them without being asked. You care about the company's success as if it were your own.



•

Self-motivated and proactive — you do not need to be micromanaged. You take initiative, manage your own time, and deliver without constant supervision.



•

Exceptional attention to detail — in a luxury brand, every word, every image, every interaction matters. Sloppy work is not acceptable.



•

Hunger to learn and grow — you are not looking for a comfortable job. You are looking for an opportunity to develop yourself, learn new skills, and build something meaningful.



•

Reliability and honesty — you show up, you deliver what you promise, and you communicate openly when there are problems. Trust is everything in a small team.



•

Thick skin and resilience — startup life is not always smooth. There will be pressure, tight deadlines, and 
nts of uncertainty. You need to be someone who thrives under pressure, not crumbles.



•

Cultural sensitivity — our clients are wealthy, discerning individuals from the USA, Middle East, Asia, and Europe. You must be comfortable communicating in a way that reflects the sophistication of our brand.









WHAT WE OFFER



Benefit

Details

Salary

£1,000 GBP/month (~?73,000) for the first 6 months

Performance Bonuses

Introduced after 6 months based on KPIs and company performance

Equity Potential

For exceptional performers, genuine opportunity to earn equity in the company

Direct Mentorship

Work directly with the founder — learn luxury brand building from someone who has built an £80M+ company

Career Growth

As the first employee, you will grow into a senior role as the company scales

Work Schedule

Flexible within reason — we need overlap with UK business hours (some flexibility for PH timezone)

Equipment

You must have your own reliable computer and stable internet connection

13th Month

Yes, we will honour the 13th month payment

Paid Leave

Standard PH holidays plus additional leave after 6 months















THE INTERVIEW PROCESS



We are being very selective because this hire is critical. The process will be:



Stage 1: Application

Apply with your CV/resume and a cover letter explaining why you are the right person for this role. Include links to any portfolio work, social media accounts you have managed, or articles you have written.



Stage 2: Written Questionnaire

Shortlisted candidates will receive a detailed written questionnaire. This is designed to test your English writing ability, your thinking, your creativity, and your understanding of the luxury market. There are no trick questions — we want to see how you think.



Stage 3: Video Interview

Top candidates from the questionnaire stage will be invited to a video call with the founder. This will be a real conversation — we want to get to know you as a person, not just a set of skills.



Stage 4: Paid Trial Task

Finalists will be given a short paid trial task (2–3 hours of work) to demonstrate their abilities in a real-world scenario.



Stage 5: In-Person Interview in Manila

The founder will be travelling to Manila in late March / early April 2026 to conduct final face-to-face interviews with the top candidates. This is the final stage before a job offer is made.









HOW TO APPLY



Please send your application including:



1.

Your CV/resume (PDF preferred)



2.

A cover letter (maximum 500 words) explaining:



•

Why this role excites you



•

What experience you have that is most relevant



•

Where you see yourself in 3 years







3.

Portfolio links — any examples of content you have written, social media accounts you have managed, or marketing campaigns you have worked on



4.

A short writing sample — write 150–200 words describing what makes a piece of antique furniture valuable. This does not need to be expert-level — we want to see your writing style, research ability, and how you communicate complex ideas simply.



Important: Applications that do not include the writing sample will not be considered. We receive many applications and this is how we filter for people who actually read the full job description and follow instructions.



We look forward to hearing from you. This is a genuine opportunity to be part of something special from the very beginning.









Source Me It — Global Sourcing Experts

title: Outbound and Inbound Calls
description:
We are seeking a highly organized, personable, and sales-oriented professional to serve as the first point of contact for prospective and existing patients. This role requires someone who can confidently handle inbound and outbound calls, convert inquiries into clients, and manage communication workflows through
 and CRM platforms.



This position blends customer service, inside sales, and technical administration. The ideal candidate is proactive, detail-oriented, and comfortable working in a fast-paced healthcare environment.



Key Responsibilities

Patient Communication & Phone Support



Answer inbound phone calls in a professional and empathetic manner



Make outbound follow-up calls to new leads and existing patients



Educate potential patients on services, pricing, and process



Handle objections professionally and guide callers toward enrollment



Escalate clinical questions appropriately to licensed providers



Sales & Lead Conversion



Manage and qualify inbound leads



Follow structured sales scripts while maintaining authenticity



Track pipeline progress and ensure timely follow-ups



Improve conversion rates through consistent follow-up strategies



Hit daily, weekly, and monthly performance targets



 & CRM Management



Respond promptly and professionally to inbound
s



Organize and manage patient communications within CRM



Document interactions accurately and thoroughly



Maintain clean, organized lead pipelines



Assist in optimizing CRM workflows and automation



Administrative & Technical Support



Coordinate appointment scheduling and onboarding processes



Ensure patient documentation is complete and accurate



Troubleshoot common tech issues with patient portals and intake forms



Collaborate with marketing and operations teams to improve processes



Qualifications

Required



2+ years of phone-based sales or high-volume call experience



Strong verbal and written communication skills



Comfortable working with
 platforms and documentation systems



Ability to manage multiple tasks while maintaining accuracy



Preferred



Experience in healthcare, telehealth, wellness, or medical sales



Familiarity with HIPAA-compliant communication practices



Experience handling high-value service sales



Strong objection-handling ability

title: SEO Specialist (Local & Ecommerce SEO)
description:
We’re looking for a results-driven SEO Specialist with deep expertise in Local SEO and Ecommerce SEO to drive organic growth, improve search visibility, and increase revenue. This role requires a strategic thinker who understands user intent, search engine quality guidelines, and how to translate SEO into measurable business results.



You’ll be responsible for developing and executing SEO strategies that improve rankings, traffic, and conversions across both local service pages and ecommerce product/category pages.



Key Responsibilities

???? SEO Strategy & Execution



Develop and implement comprehensive SEO strategies for both local and ecommerce websites



Conduct keyword research aligned with user intent (Do-Know-Go framework)



Perform competitor analysis and gap analysis



Create SEO roadmaps based on business goals and revenue targets



???? Local SEO



Optimize Google Business Profiles



Manage local citations and NAP consistency



Implement local schema markup



Optimize location pages for high-intent queries



Improve rankings in local pack/map results



Develop review acquisition and reputation strategies



???? Ecommerce SEO



Optimize product pages, category pages, and faceted navigation



Improve crawlability and internal linking for large sites



Handle duplicate content and pagination issues



Optimize for transactional and commercial intent keywords



Improve product schema implementation



Increase organic revenue and conversion rates



???? Technical SEO



Conduct technical audits (crawl errors, indexing, site speed, Core Web Vitals)



Optimize site architecture and URL structure



Identify and resolve thin content and crawl budget issues



Work with developers on SEO implementations



?? On-Page Optimization



Optimize titles, meta descriptions, headers, and content



Improve content quality and relevance to match search intent



Align content with search engine quality guidelines



Enhance E-E-A-T signals (Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, Trust)



???? Off-Page SEO



Develop white-hat link-building strategies



Build high-quality backlinks



Identify toxic links and manage disavow strategy when necessary



Execute digital PR initiatives



???? Reporting & Analytics



Track rankings, traffic, revenue, and conversions



Provide monthly SEO performance reports



Analyze data to refine strategy and improve ROI



Use data to identify new growth opportunities



Required Qualifications



3+ years of proven SEO experience



Demonstrated success with Local SEO and Ecommerce SEO



Strong understanding of search intent and search quality guidelines



Experience with tools such as:



Google Search Console



Google Analytics



Ahrefs / SEMrush



Screaming Frog



Experience optimizing large ecommerce websites



Strong understanding of structured data and schema markup



Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and basic technical SEO principles



Preferred Qualifications



Experience with Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento, or BigCommerce



Experience managing multi-location businesses



Understanding of Core Web Vitals and site performance optimization



Experience working with development teams



Basic CRO knowledge



Key Competencies



Analytical and data-driven



Strong problem-solving skills



Detail-oriented



Strong communication skills



Self-motivated and results-oriented



Ability to translate SEO into business impact



Success Metrics



Increased organic traffic



Improved keyword rankings



Growth in local map pack visibility



Increased ecommerce revenue from organic search



Improved conversion rates



Improved technical health scores





Include in you application an answer to this question: In your first month as an SEO Specialist, how would you approach managing a WooCommerce website with 15,000+ products? What would be your first steps and why?

title: Customer Support Associate (Growth Opportunity from Part-Time to Full-Time) – U.S. Company
description:
Our home health agency is committed to providing exceptional, compassionate care to those who need support at home. We’re looking for a personable, well-spoken, and detail-oriented individual to be the welcoming voice and first point of contact for our clients and their families. If you thrive in a supportive environment and care deeply about making a difference, we encourage you to apply.



Position Summary:

The Phone Intake & Customer Service Representative is responsible for answering incoming calls, making outbound calls for lead follow-up, client engagement, and service inquiries, actively listening to client needs, responding with empathy, and guiding potential clients through our intake process. This role also includes handling a variety of administrative tasks to support our care coordination and office operations.

• Guaranteed 20 hours per week to start, with the potential to increase to 40 hours per week

• Desktop computer or laptop (NO Chromebooks or iPads accepted) and a cell phone as a backup.

• Noise-cancelling headset

• Quiet workspace and stable, fast internet connection

• Reliable backup plan for power/internet interruptions

• Highly organized and detail-oriented





________________________________________

Key Responsibilities:

• Answer and manage all incoming/outgoing phone calls with professionalism and compassion

• Explain home health services clearly and accurately

• Ask relevant questions to assess service needs and collect intake information

• Provide a warm, supportive, and informative experience for every caller

• Handle follow-up calls and coordinate with other tea
mbers when needed

• Maintain confidentiality and comply with HIPAA and agency policies

• Confidence using tools like Gmail and Canva

• Assist with other related tasks as needed to support operations

________________________________________

Qualifications:

• Excellent spoken and written English with clear, professional accent — must be fluent. Please do not apply if you are not fluent in English.

• Comfortable handling phone calls with US clients

• Experience in customer success, customer support, or sales

• Strong listening and interpersonal communication skills

• Ability to handle sensitive conversations with empathy and discretion

• Prior experience in a healthcare, home health, or customer service setting preferred

• Comfortable using phone systems,
, and client management software

title: Accounting & Invoice Reconciliation Specialist (One-Time Gig)
description:
We are looking for a detail-oriented accounting or bookkeeping professional for a one-time project to help us clean up and reconcile our invoices.



ABOUT THE JOB:

We have approximately 110 invoices spread across WaveApps (our accounting software) and personal
 accounts. We need someone to go through all of them, match everything properly, identify any missing or unmatched payments, and organize the records in a clear and structured way. This is a one-time cleanup task — not an ongoing role.



WHAT YOU WILL DO:

- Review all invoices stored in WaveApps and collected from personal
 accounts (approximately 110 invoices total)

- Match and reconcile invoices against 3 Google Ads accounts — we are not sure exactly how many invoices correspond to Google Ads vs. other clients/vendors, so a full cross-check is needed

- Identify any missing payments or discrepancies across all sources

- Verify payments against bank statements from 2 banks: Wise (app) and Wio Bank, across 2 currencies

- Organize and clean up all records so everything is properly matched and accounted for

- Provide a clear summary or report of findings (what's matched, what's missing, what needs follow-up)



HOW ACCESS WILL BE PROVIDED:

- You will be given remote access to our laptop so you can collect all
s and relevant documents directly

- Bank statements from Wise and Wio Bank will be provided to cross-check whether payments went through



IDEAL CANDIDATE:

- Experience with bookkeeping, accounting, or invoice reconciliation

- Familiarity with WaveApps is a plus

- Experience with Google Ads billing/invoices is a plus

- Comfortable working with multi-currency records

- Strong attention to detail

- Good communication — please share any relevant experience or similar work you've done before

- Able to work independently and deliver a clean, organized output



HOW TO APPLY:

Please tell us about any previous experience you have with invoice reconciliation, accounting cleanup, or similar tasks. Include examples if possible. Also let us know your availability and how you'd approach this project.



COMPENSATION:

$100 USD for the full project (open to discussion based on scope).

title: Real Estate Data Automation VA (Python + Secretary of State Research)
description:
Real Estate Data Automation VA (Python + Secretary of State Research)



---



## About the Role



I am a U.S.-based real estate investor and broker building a proprietary property owner database focused properties owned in entitys.



I am looking for a highly skilled Data Automation VA who can build and maintain a repeatable workflow that:



1. Pulls property owner + mailing info from public county/open data sources

2. Identifies when ownership is under an LLC or entity

3. Searches Secretary of State / business registry websites

4. Extracts managers, members, officers, or registered agent information

5. Outputs everything into structured Google Sheets



This is NOT basic data entry. This is structured research + automation.



If you only copy/paste manually, this job is not for you.



---



## What You’ll Be Building



You will create a repeatable workflow that:



* Takes in property addresses (Google Sheet input)

* Pulls parcel + owner + mailing address from public records



---



## Required Skills



* Strong English reading comprehension

* Python (requests, pandas) OR strong automation tools (Apify, Make, Zapier, etc.)

* Experience pulling data from:



  * County property portals

  * Assessor or tax sites

  * Secretary of State business registry sites

* Ability to handle:



  * Inconsistent data

  * Multiple entity matches

  * Manual exception handling

* Google Sheets advanced knowledge

* Process documentation (SOP writing + Loom videos)



---



## Bonus Skills (Preferred but Not Required)



* Experience with U.S. real estate data

* Experience with state public data

* API experience (Socrata, ArcGIS, CKAN)

* Light SQL knowledge

* Experience building semi-automated research systems



---



## Paid Test (Required)



You will be given 25 properties and must:



* Pull owner + mailing info

* Identify ownership type

* Perform Secretary of State lookup when entity-owned

* Extract control person information when available

* Provide structured Google Sheet output

* Include source links for every record

* Submit short SOP explaining your workflow



This is a paid test.



---



## Hours & Growth



* Starting: 10–20 hours per week

* Opportunity to grow into long-term full-time role

* Potential performance bonuses if system becomes scalable



I am building a long-term system. If you are detail-oriented and think like a problem solver, this could become a core position.



---



## How to Apply



In your application:



1. Start your message with the word **“Bad Boys”**

2. Briefly explain:



   * What tools you would use to automate this

   * How you would handle Secretary of State searches

3. Include one example of a similar project you have done.

4. Confirm your hourly rate.



Applications that do not follow instructions will not be reviewed.



---



If you're serious about building structured systems and not just doing data entry, I look forward to reviewing your application.

title: YouTube Thumbnail Designer
description:
Do you have an eye for successful YouTube titles and thumbnail design? We are looking for a consistent, long-term virtual assistant who will research topics and make YouTube thumbnails.



We run multiple faceless YouTube channels and this role is less about making "cool/pretty" designs and more about the psychology behind making people click on our videos.



This is a long-term position requiring about 20-30 hours per week (Flexible hours), and making 40-100 thumbnails a week using AI tools and Canva to speed up the process. The job pays $2 per hour with a pay increase based on performance.



Responsibilities



1. Research: You must regularly conduct research on YouTube topics to come up with thumbnails and titles.

2. Thumbnail Design: Make thumbnails using images from the web, AI image tools and Canva, focusing on layout and composition.  We are NOT just looking for pretty images.

3. Titles: Come up with compelling titles based on your research and our guidelines. 



Requirements: 



1. Experience driving views to YouTube videos with your thumbnail designs.

2. Understand what makes people click on a video.

3. Familiarity with tools like Canva and prompting AI image generators.

Complete a test task. 



Pay:



1. $2 USD Per hour

2. Paid on the 1st and 15th of every month

3. Must have a Payoneer

4. 20 hours a week, but Flexible hours (Work on your own time)



If you’re passionate about creating work that drives results and wants consistent work long-term, reply now! Tell us why you’re the perfect fit for this role. We will send you the application form with the test task to apply. Use "TND25" as the subject of your message so we know you’re a serious candidate.

title: Virtual Assistant Bookkeeper – Australian Property & Cleaning Businesses
description:
Job Title: Virtual Assistant Bookkeeper – Australian Property & Cleaning Businesses



Company: Campfire (short-term rental/Airbnb management) & Wine Coast Cleaning Crew (cleaning for those properties)

We are looking for a reliable, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant Bookkeeper to join our small Australian team long term. You will work remotely (Philippines-based), managing the day-to-day bookkeeping for two Xero files plus some back-office admin and process documentation. 



Key responsibilities include: daily bank reconciliations for two Xero files, preparing and scheduling payments to contract cleaners, weekly customer invoicing, updating cash flow and revenue forecasts (including new bookings), basic payroll support, updating contractor rate sheets, checking cleaner rosters/tasks, simple reporting in Excel/Google Sheets, and maintaining/updating SOPs and checklists.



Hours: approximately 30 hours per week, Monday–Friday, with flexible scheduling but consistent coverage for daily reconciliations, payments, and forecasting updates.



You should have solid experience with Xero, strong attention to detail, good written English, and be very comfortable working with spreadsheets and structured processes. The business owner is an accountant, so you will be supported on complex judgement calls; your focus is accuracy, consistency, and following/improving documented processes. 

Our current VA has given 30 days’ notice, so we are aiming to hire and onboard the new person within this period to allow a proper handover.

title: Social Media and Business Coordinator
description:
Social Media Manager and Business Coordinator (Part-Time or Full-Time)



About Kawi



Kawi is launching Metro Vancouver's first multi-venue fitness booking platform this May. We're making it easy for people to discover and access the best combat sports, yoga, pilates, cycling, and recovery studios across the region with flexible credit-based memberships.



We're at the starting line: building from zero partnerships to launch-ready in 3 months. We need someone who can create the social media presence and community that makes our launch impossible to ignore.



The Mission



Build Kawi's social media presence from the ground up before, during, and after our May launch. You'll be our voice on social - creating content that makes people excited about flexible fitness, documenting our journey, and building a community of fitness enthusiasts who are hungry for this solution.



This is a ground-floor opportunity: You'll have creative freedom to define our social presence and prove your impact as we grow. This is a major growth opportunity at a new business!



What You'll Do



Content Creation (50%)



    Create scroll-stopping content for Instagram, TikTok,
 and 

    Produce posts, reels, stories, and videos that showcase different fitness verticals (combat sports, yoga, cycling, traditional strength training etc.)

    Source and curate content from gym/studio partners and fitness creators

    Build anticipation for our May launch through countdowns, teasers, announcements and community engagement

    Design graphics and edit videos using templates and mobile tools



Community Building & Outreach (40%)



    Grow our following organically through strategic engagement

    Interact authentically with fitness enthusiasts, gyms, studios, and athletes across social platforms

    Respond to DMs and comments to build relationships before launch

    Prospect and reach out to gyms/studios via Instagram DM to introduce Kawi

    Send prospecting
s to fitness businesses to gauge partnership interest

    Make occasional phone calls to follow up with warm leads and schedule meetings for the founder

    Follow and engage with target audience accounts (fitness lovers interested in flexible memberships)

    Monitor trending fitness content and jump on relevant trends



Strategy & Reporting (10%)



    Track what content performs and optimize accordingly

    Maintain a simple content calendar aligned with launch milestones

    Weekly check-ins to review analytics and adjust strategy

    Keep organized records of outreach efforts and responses



You're a Great Fit If You:



    Love fitness - you genuinely get excited about gyms, studios, and the fitness scene

    Understand social platforms intuitively - you know what makes people stop scrolling

    Are comfortable with outreach - reaching out to new businesses via DM,
, or phone doesn't intimidate you

    Can create content independently - we're scrappy, you'll work with stock footage, Canva, and basic editing tools

    Thrive in zero-to-one environments - building from scratch excites you, not scares you

    Write naturally - your captions and outreach messages don't sound like corporate marketing or from an AI bot, it truly engages with people

    Can work autonomously - Direction and scope is given, but you own the execution

    Are organized - tracking outreach, content calendars, and multiple tasks simultaneously

    Understand the market - You must understand ClassPass's strengths and weaknesses



Bonus Points:



    Experience with fitness/wellness brands or communities

    Video editing skills (CapCut, Canva Video, basic motion graphics)

    Knowledge of different fitness verticals (not just one set of activities)

    Experience with cold outreach or prospecting

    Upkeep of current and future social media trends across multiple applications (Instagram, Tiktok, LinkedIn,
)

    Comfortable working across multiple time zones

    Render designs for documents front-end website



About the role:



Hours: Part-time (20-30 hours/week) or Full-time (40 hours/week)

Schedule: Flexible - work when it makes sense for content creation and engagement and to attend weekly meetings 

Location: Fully remote 

Start Date: Immediate 



Growth Opportunity: If we crush our launch together and you prove impact, this could evolve into a core long-term role as we scale. You'd essentially be employee #1 on the growth side.



To Apply



Send us an
 or a message with:

    

    Brief intro (3-4 sentences) - Introduce yourself and tell us what excites you about the role!

    Portfolio - Links to social accounts you've managed OR samples of content you've created. This can also be a through description of your past roles and work.

  

Subject line: "Social Media and Business Coordinator - Maz

Send to: 

You may also send this as a message on onlinejobs.ph



What Makes Kawi Different



We're not another corporate fitness app. We're building something that actually solves a real problem: access to the best boutique fitness without getting locked into expensive monthly memberships.



You'd be helping build the brand identity from scratch during the most exciting phase - launch. Your work will directly impact whether we succeed or fail.



If you want to build something real, apply.

title: Remote QuickBooks Bookkeeper (Distributor / Import Business)
description:
About Us

MM Solutions is a growing U.S.-based distribution company specializing in custom packaging, hardware sourcing, and vape products under the PWR Clouds brand. We manage overseas manufacturing relationships and sell directly to clients while scaling our financial systems for long term growth.



Position Overview

We are looking for a reliable remote QuickBooks professional to organize and maintain our financial records. The role starts with cleanup and categorization of prior year transactions, then transitions into ongoing monthly bookkeeping support. This position requires someone who can follow detailed instructions and work independently.



Responsibilities



Rebuild and organize prior year transactions using bank feeds



Categorize revenue, COGS, and expenses correctly



Enter and manage client invoices and vendor bills



Reconcile bank and credit card accounts



Maintain clean P&L reporting by business segment



Track Accounts Receivable and vendor payments



Provide clear monthly financial summaries



Requirements



Strong experience with QuickBooks Online



Prior bookkeeping experience with distributors, import/export, or product-based businesses



Understanding of revenue vs COGS structure



High attention to detail and organized workflow



Fluent written English



Ability to follow written systems and directions exactly



Directions (Read Carefully Before Applying)



Your application message must be titled exactly: Quickbooks Professional



Begin your message by confirming you have read the full job description.



Include a short summary of your QuickBooks Online experience.



Provide one example of a cleanup or catch-up bookkeeping project you completed.



Confirm that you are comfortable working inside QuickBooks only without bank login access.



Explain clearly how you track your working time (software used, screenshots, manual logs, etc.).



Applications that do not follow these directions will not be considered.



Work Structure



Remote, part-time



Flexible hours



Initial cleanup project followed by ongoing monthly support



Access provided through QuickBooks only (no bank login access)



How to Apply

Send a brief introduction following the directions above, along with your QuickBooks experience and availability.

title: Roblox Lua Developer (Anime Simulator Project)
description:
We are building a One Piece-inspired Roblox Simulator game and are looking for a reliable Roblox Lua developer to help build core gameplay systems.



This project includes:



• Player level system with scaling XP requirements

• Mob XP scaling based on level

• Training zones with multipliers

• Skill-based stat growth (Melee, Sword, Fruit, Defense, Haki)

• Auto-clicker gamepass integration

• Basic UI systems



This is a part-time position (approximately 20-25 hours per week).



Compensation is $350 per month to start, with opportunity for increases based on performance and long-term collaboration.



We are looking for someone who:



• Has experience scripting in Roblox Studio

• Understands progression systems and scaling formulas

• Writes clean and optimized Lua code

• Can properly manage server vs client logic

• Understands RemoteEvents and RemoteFunctions

• Communicates clearly and meets deadlines

• Can work independently



AI tools are allowed and encouraged to improve productivity. However, you must fully understand Roblox Lua scripting and be able to debug, optimize, and modify any AI-generated code. You must be able to fix bugs AI may create and understand how the systems work internally.



Applicants who rely solely on AI without understanding core scripting concepts will not be a good fit.



Please include in your application:



• Links to Roblox games you have worked on

• A short explanation of how you would design a scalable XP system

• Your availability per week

• Your experience level with Roblox Lua



This is intended to be a long-term project with future updates and expansions.



Communication for this project will be handled through 
.



If you are interested in applying, please join our development 
 server and introduce yourself:







When you join, briefly introduce yourself and mention your experience with Roblox Lua scripting.



Serious applicants only.



Technical Keywords:



Roblox Studio

Roblox Development

Lua Scripting

Roblox Lua

RemoteEvents

RemoteFunctions

Client-Server Architecture

XP Systems

Game Progression Design

title: Senior SEO & GEO (AI Search) Specialist
description:

We are seeking a highly experienced SEO & GEO AI Optimization Specialist to lead advanced organic search strategies across Google and Bing.



This is a senior-level position for someone who understands not only traditional SEO, but also Generative Engine Optimisation (GEO) — how AI-driven search engines interpret, extract, and rank content.



A very large part of this role involves custom, strategic copywriting that is NOT AI-generated. You must be capable of producing high-converting, technically structured, search-optimised content manually.



This role is for a real strategist — not someone relying on automation tools to do the thinking.



Core Responsibilities

Advanced Search Strategy



Develop and execute SEO strategies for Google and Bing



Optimise for AI-driven search environments (GEO / AI overviews)



Create structured content that is entity-aligned and semantically optimised

Onsite & Technical SEO



Technical audits and implementation roadmaps



Schema and structured data strategy



Internal linking architecture



Crawl budget optimisation



Indexation strategy



Core Web Vitals optimisation



Offsite & Authority Building



Advanced backlink acquisition campaigns



Digital PR strategies



Authority stacking



Anchor text strategy



Competitor backlink gap analysis



Custom Copywriting (Major Component of Role)

Develop suburb/location pages with unique positioning



Produce service pages structured for semantic SEO



Write long-form authority blog content



Create content designed for AI extraction and featured snippets



All content must be manually written and strategically structured — not AI-generated bulk content.



Mandatory Requirements



Minimum 5–10 years proven SEO experience



Demonstrated ranking success across competitive industries



Deep knowledge of both Google and Bing search ecosystems



Strong understanding of GEO / AI Search optimisation

To Apply

Traffic growth data

Examples of manually written content
