Applications without a voice recording will not be reviewed.

title: Generative AI Trainer
description:
We’re on the lookout for a Generative AI Trainer to help us collect, structure, and validate mechanical component data for our early-stage AI company. In this role, you’ll work on building an intelligent agent that performs foundational mechanical design work for industrial systems, including data center electrical and cooling infrastructure. Plus, you’ll collaborate with a supportive team while contributing to process improvements in our AI data pipelines.



We’re looking for someone who loves research, thrives in spreadsheets, and enjoys turning messy technical data into clean, structured datasets. You’ll need to be comfortable using AI tools daily, handling large volumes of data, and performing quality checks to ensure accuracy. This role is research-driven, fast-paced, and requires precision—you’ll help power the AI system that’s at the heart of our operations.



Above all, we need someone self-motivated, detail-oriented, and able to work independently while collaborating with the team asynchronously. If this sounds like the challenge you’re looking for, we’d love to hear from you!



Responsibilities:

- Research industrial mechanical and electrical components (terminal boxes, lugs, fuses, wires, enclosures, compressors, etc.)

- Locate manufacturer data sheets and technical documentation online

- Extract detailed specifications from PDFs and other technical documents

- Use AI tools (e.g., Claude, ChatGPT, or other extraction tools) to scrape, structure, and reformat data

- Reformat messy documentation into clean, structured datasets

- Validate AI outputs for correctness and completeness

- Organize all data in Google Sheets and structured catalogs, maintaining consistency in formatting and categorization

- Cross-reference data between sheets and prepare clean datasets for AI training and analysis

- Perform QA checks to ensure accuracy before data enters the AI training pipeline

- Work within a structured team workflow with research assignments

- Participate in cross-team QA reviews

- Communicate clearly and asynchronously with the team

- Contribute ideas for improving processes, speed, and efficiency

- Work in short, rapid cycles (1–2 day turnaround targets per component category)

- Focus on delivering structured, high-quality output efficiently while adapting quickly as priorities evolve



Requirements:

- 5+ years of experience in BPO Customer Support, Operations, or Documentation Management, especially with US-based businesses.

- Experience working at a US-based startup is a major plus!

- Exceptional research skills and ability to find accurate technical information efficiently

- Extremely detail-oriented and comfortable working with technical specs and numbers

- Strong Google Sheets proficiency (formulas, cross-sheet referencing, data organization)

- Comfortable handling large datasets across multiple files

- Regular user of AI tools and curious about improving workflows

- Strong written communication skills

- Self-starter who works independently but collaborates effectively

- Comfortable asking questions and clarifying ambiguity

- Fast learner who can absorb processes quickly

- Comfortable working in a remote, async-first team



Bonus (Not Required):

- Exposure to mechanical, electrical, or industrial systems

- Experience working with technical documentation or engineering data

- Previous AI training, AI ops, or data structuring experience

- Experience handling structured product catalogs.



Salary and Benefits:

- Base salary: 55k PHP per month.

- Paid Time Off + Paid Holidays.

- 100% WFH.

- Flexible work arrangements and supportive team environment.



When applying, send your resume link, explain why you're a good fit. Also copy and paste this Job ID: recVi9bgoKW7Hdwyg into your
 response, along with this message: “I’m excited to be applying to Job ID:recVi9bgoKW7Hdwyg!” This will let us know what job you’re applying for as well as show us that you actually read this entire job description (attention to detail is everything). Thanks and hope to hear from you soon!

description:

Expectations:

OR

“Finished” means:



• Proper S-Log color grade

• Clean stabilization

• Professional pacing

• Captions integrated

• Exported and delivered



No next-day finishing.



We shoot during our U.S. daytime and upload footage at the end of our day.



You edit during your regular daytime hours in your country.



We expect completed videos delivered by our morning (Eastern Time).

• Professional S-Log color grading

You should not need training on fundamentals.



initiative Is Required

We expect growth, not idle time.



Communication & Feedback

Long-Term Role



We move quickly.



30-Day Performance Metrics

Raises and leadership opportunities are available to those who excel in their performance.



Compensation



$2,000/month starting.



We are paying top-tier for overseas talent.



We expect top-tier performance.



To Apply



You MUST include:



Your strongest short-form real estate edits

Your average editing time for a 60-second premium reel

title: RN - Insurance Verification
description:
We are seeking a Registered Nurse who understands that access to care is just as important as the care itself. As an RN on our Global Support Team, you will play a critical role in ensuring patients move seamlessly from referral to diagnosis and treatment by securing accurate insurance verification and prior authorizations. We are a high-volume, fast-paced sleep medicine practice, and this role sits at the center of protecting both the patient experience and the clinical workflow. If you are detail-oriented, organized, and confident navigating complex payer systems, this position offers meaningful impact every single day.



The RN – Insurance Verification will be responsible for verifying insurance eligibility and benefits for sleep-related diagnostic and therapeutic services, obtaining prior authorizations through payer portals and over the phone, and collaborating closely with physicians, advanced practice providers, and clinical teams to ensure documentation meets medical necessity requirements. This role requires proactive follow-up with insurance carriers, accurate EMR documentation, and the ability to identify and resolve authorization barriers before they delay patient care. Success in this position means minimizing denials, reducing treatment delays, and ensuring patients can move forward without unnecessary friction.



Applicants must hold an active, unrestricted RN license and have direct experience with insurance verification and prior authorizations. Strong familiarity with payer portals and phone-based authorization workflows is essential. title: Experienced Social Media & Digital Marketing Strategist
description:
About Us

We are a Sydney-based boutique mortgage agency focused on delivering strategic, relationship-driven lending advice to property buyers, investors, and business owners. We position ourselves as a specialist advisory firm — not a volume brokerage — and are seeking an experienced Digital Marketing VA to help elevate our digital presence and professional network



Role Overview

Location: Remote (Philippines-based)

Hours: Approx. 3-5 hours per week (may vary week to week)

Remuneration: Competitive for the right candidate

Work Style: Autonomous with accountability

This is not a task-based role. We are seeking a confident, assertive and experienced digital operator who can take initiative, drive strategy and deliver results.

Key Responsibilities

• Lead and execute social media strategy across Instagram, LinkedIn,
 and YouTube.

• Create premium branded content using Canva (advanced level required).

• Edit short-form video content using CapCut.

• Utilise Submagic, Pyxa (or equivalent AI tools) for subtitles and video enhancement.

• Integrate multiple digital tools into a seamless content production and scheduling workflow.

• Manage content automation and cross-platform scheduling.

• Implement SEO strategies to improve organic visibility.

• Position the brand as a boutique specialist in the Sydney and broader market.

• Identify and support development of Professional Partner relationships (Accountants & Financial Planners).

• Assist with LinkedIn positioning and outreach strategies.

Required Skills & Experience

• Advanced Canva design capability.

• Strong CapCut video editing skills.

• Experience with automation tools (Submagic, Pyxa or equivalents).

• Understanding of SEO fundamentals and keyword positioning.

• Ability to integrate tools into efficient digital systems.

• Experience managing multi-platform social media strategy.

• Strategic thinking and commercial awareness.

• Ability to work independently and take ownership.

Bonus: Prior experience working with finance, mortgage, real estate or professional services brands.

Ideal Candidate

You are confident, assertive and proactive. You do not wait for instructions — you identify opportunities and execute. You understand digital systems, automation, brand positioning and professional engagement. You think strategically and deliver with precision.

How to Apply

Please provide the following:

1. Your CV.

2. Portfolio or social media accounts you have managed.

3. 2–3 Canva design samples.

4. 1 short-form video edited in CapCut.

5. A short written response (150–200 words): 'How would you position a boutique mortgage agency as a specialist brand while attracting professional referral partners?'



Only experienced candidates who can demonstrate systems-thinking and strategic capability will be shortlisted.

title: SEO specialist
description:
Our website  photon.codes gets solid traction from developer communities, GitHub, HN, Reddit, and X — but we want to appear much higher (ideally first page) when people search for terms like "photon ai agents", "spectrum framework", "photon imessage", "ai agents messaging", and especially branded + intent searches around "photon".  



We're looking for a results-focused part-time SEO specialist to own quick wins and ongoing improvements so our site shows up prominently in Google for the right queries.



Key Responsibilities

- Audit & Quick Technical Wins — Run full technical SEO audits (using tools like Google Search Console, Screaming Frog, PageSpeed Insights, Ahrefs/Semrush if you have access). Fix crawl/indexing issues, Core Web Vitals, mobile usability, schema markup (especially for Article, SoftwareApplication, Organization), duplicate content, broken links, and HTTPS/mixed content problems.

- On-Page Optimization — Optimize title tags, meta descriptions, headings, alt text, internal linking, and keyword placement on high-priority pages (homepage, /spectrum, blog posts, /residency, etc.). Strengthen branding signals for "Photon" to help with branded search visibility.

- Keyword Research & Strategy — Identify high-intent, achievable keywords (long-tail + mid-competition) related to AI agents, messaging integrations, iMessage AI, open-source agent frameworks. Focus on terms where we can realistically rank in weeks/months rather than fighting Wikipedia/physics for generic "photon".

- Off-Page & Authority Building — Recommend/execute lightweight link-building tactics (guest posts, directory listings, HARO, outreach to AI/dev communities, Reddit/X amplification) without spammy tactics.

- Tracking & Reporting — Set up proper tracking in Google Search Console + Analytics (if not already). 

- Provide weekly/bi-weekly reports on rankings, impressions, clicks, traffic growth, and key fixes implemented. Goal: measurable organic traffic uplift.



Requirements

- Proven Experience — 2+ years hands-on SEO (agency, in-house, or freelance), with demonstrated results improving rankings/traffic for tech/startup/SaaS websites.

- Tool Proficiency — Comfortable with Google Search Console, Google Analytics 4, PageSpeed Insights, Screaming Frog, Ahrefs/Semrush/Ahrefs alternatives (free tiers ok), and basic schema tools.

- Technical SEO Skills — Strong understanding of Core Web Vitals, crawl budget, structured data, site speed optimization, mobile-first indexing.

- Results-Oriented & Independent — Self-starter who can prioritize high-impact tasks, work async, and communicate progress clearly (we use Slack/Notion).





We're reviewing applications on a rolling basis and aim to start within the next 1–2 weeks. Looking forward to hearing how you'd get photon.codes ranking higher fast!

title: Home Care Recruiter
description:
About Us



At Helper Heroes, we’re on a mission to provide exceptional care and support to home care agencies in America. We believe in creating a true partnership where our employees act and feel like a true member of the American team they are matched with. Our goal is to help them create a compassionate, innovative, and efficient care experience for their clients and their families. To achieve this, we’re looking for a Helper Hero to join our team and help us shine even brighter!

mber—you’re a Helper Hero! If you’re passionate about making a difference, have a knack for organization, and thrive in a fast-paced, mission-driven environment, you’re who we are looking for. If you’re the kind of person who loves tackling behind-the-scenes tasks with a smile, ensuring that our clients' caregivers and clients receive the best possible support, apply today!

onboarding, and administrative tasks for a growing home care business. This role is

ideal for someone with experience in healthcare recruitment and a passion for

streamlining operations. You will work closely with the owner to alleviate their workload,

enabling them to focus on business growth and client care.

s/lead inquiries.

Qualifications:

- Strong organizational and time-management abilities.

- Proficiency with CRM systems,
 management, and cloud-based tools (e.g., Google Drive).

- Proactive mindset—anticipate needs before they arise.

- Proven experience in recruitment, preferably in healthcare or home care staffing.

- Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to build rapport with candidates and tea
mbers.

- Ability to work independently and manage time effectively in a fast-paced environment.

- Familiarity with recruitment platforms and CRM tools

- A positive attitude, sense of humor, and a passion for helping others.



Attributes of a Successful Helper Hero:

- Communication: You speak impeccable English. You’re a clear and friendly communicator, both written and verbal.

- Reliability: You’re dependable, punctual, and always ready to step up when needed.



Why You’ll Love Working with Us:

care possible.

- Growth Opportunities: As we grow, so will you! There’s plenty of room for

advancement and learning.

- Fun & Supportive Team: We’re a tight-knit group that values collaboration,

compassion, and a good laugh.



Ready to Be a Hero?



If you’re excited about the opportunity to join our team, where you’ll be appreciated,

have a sense of purpose and inclusion and are willing to help us create a brighter, more

compassionate care experience, we can’t wait to hear from you! Apply today and let’s

title: Executive Assistant
description:

This is not a basic virtual assistant role.



If you are looking for simple task lists, calendar management, or repetitive admin work — this is not a fit.



This role exists to create leverage for a fast-moving CEO and COO at a growing U.S.-based marketing agency.



You will operate in a high-context, high-standards environment with frequent switching between hiring, writing, coordination, analytics, and execution.



If you thrive in ambiguity, think in systems, and use AI as a force multiplier — keep reading.



The Mission

Own the flow of information from raw input ? structured system ? finished output so leadership is no longer the bottleneck.

You will turn voice notes, Loom recordings, transcripts, and messy ideas into:

- Clean documents

- Structured hiring pipelines

- Organized dashboards

- Polished communication

- Reliable execution systems



If this role is done well, leadership feels:

- Fewer dropped balls

- Fewer repeated explanations

- Less mental clutter

- Cleaner systems

- Higher quality written output

If that does not happen, the role is not being executed correctly.



Core Areas of Ownership



1. Hiring Pipeline Execution

This is one of the highest-leverage areas.

- You will turn transcripts into:

-- Job descriptions

-- Scorecards

-- Interview questions

-- Must-have vs. nice-to-have lists

- Post jobs

- Track applicants

- Schedule interviews

- Send follow-ups

- Draft offer
s (approved before sending)

- Prepare offer letters from templates

- Coordinate references

- Manage onboarding logistics



You must be comfortable extracting structure fro
ssy conversations using AI tools.



2. “You Speak, They Build” Operations

The Founder communicates in:

- Loom videos

- Slack voice notes

- Call transcripts

- Bullet points



You turn them into:

- SOPs

- Checklists

- Notion docs

- Decision memos

- Organized execution plans

You are responsible for clarity.



3. COO Support & Internal Coordination

You will:

- Maintain executive priority trackers

- Prepare meeting agendas

- Capture notes and action items

- Follow up on commitments

- Build weekly summaries:

-- What moved

-- What’s stuck

-- What needs decision

You must follow up politely but persistently.



4. Travel & Logistics (Business + Personal)

You will own:

- Flights

- Hotels

- Itineraries

- Calendar adjustments

- Expense tracking

- Changes and cancellations

Mistakes here cost real money and time. Accuracy matters.



5. Data Organization & Reporting

You will:

- Clean messy spreadsheets

- Standardize naming conventions

- Structure data so it becomes usable

- Create charts for leadership review

- Maintain simple dashboards in Google Sheets

- Use AI tools to accelerate reporting

- Dashboards must support decisions — not decoration.



6. AI-Enabled Writing & Communication

You will draft:

- Internal announcements

- Client
s

- SOPs

- Hiring documents

- Onboarding materials

- Meeting follow-ups

- Templates



Writing must be:

- Clear

- Direct

- Professional

- No fluff

- Strong written English is mandatory.



Required Skills

You must demonstrate:

- Excellent written English

- Strong organizational ability

- High attention to detail

- Comfort working independently

- Ability to manage multiple workstreams



Proficiency with:

- Google Docs

- Google Sheets

- Calendars

- Slack

- Loom

- ChatGPT / Claude

You must be comfortable using AI daily to increase speed and clarity.



Work Expectations

- Full-time (35 hours/week)

- Minimum 6-hour overlap with US Pacific Time

- Responsive during working hours

- Written updates without prompting

- Issues escalated same day

- Missed deadlines without notice are unacceptable



This Role Is Not For You If:

- You need step-by-step instructions

- You wait to be told what to do

- You dislike writing

- You struggle with ambiguity

- You avoid follow-up

- You prefer repetitive task-only roles



Compensation

- $12,480–$16,640 USD per year

- Paid bi-monthly (1st and 15th)

- Full-time, long-term position

- Annual performance-based raise

- Stable role inside a growing company



What Good Looks Like After 60 Days

Leadership experiences:

- Cleaner systems

- Organized hiring pipelines

- Clear documentation

- Fewer dropped balls

- Less reactive scrambling

- Higher writing quality with less revision

If you are still waiting for instructions after 60 days, this role is not a fit.



Application Instructions (Required)

To be considered, you must include:

- A 3–5 minute Loom video introducing yourself

- Your internet speed (upload & download)

- Confirmation of US PT overlap hours

- A short explanation of how you use AI tools in your daily workflow

Applications missing these will not be reviewed.



What to Expect After Applying

If your application meets the requirements listed above, you will receive a skills assessment within 48 hours. The assessment is a practical exercise based on a real scenario you would encounter in this role. It is designed to take a strong candidate 60–90 minutes. We will evaluate your ability to gather information, organize it clearly, and communicate with a team — not whether you used AI to help. Candidates who score well on the assessment will be invited to a live interview. We respect your time and move quickly. 



Final Note

We are not hiring a helper. We are hiring a high-agency Executive Assistant who thinks like an operator and uses AI as leverage. If you want stability, growth, and real ownership — apply.

title: Rockstar General Virtual Assistant (E-commerce Support)

You’ll provide administrative support and assist with day-to-day e-commerce operations across our online stores and marketplaces.

title: Booking & Outreach Operator (VA Role)
description:
This is not an admin role. This is a revenue role.



I’m a speaker, performer, and educator who helps experts become magnetic on stage and turn audiences into paying clients. My work spans keynotes, emceeing, workshops, podcast interviews, and live events.



I’m hiring someone to own booking outreach and opportunity generation so I can spend more time on stages and less time chasing them.



If you wait to be told what to do, this role will overwhelm you.

If you enjoy tracking opportunities, starting conversations, and turning outreach into booked stages, keep reading.



WHAT THIS ROLE ACTUALLY IS



You are responsible for finding, qualifying, pitching, and tracking speaking and appearance opportunities.



You are not just sending
s.

You are building a pipeline of booked stages.



Your success will be measured by:



• Qualified opportunities generated

• Conversations started

• Bookings secured

• Revenue influenced



CORE RESPONSIBILITIES

Opportunity Sourcing



• Research events, conferences, podcasts, stages, and hosts

• Identify decision makers and contact info

• Build and maintain outreach databases

• Prioritize high-value opportunities



Outreach Execution



• Send personalized pitches

• Follow up consistently

• Track responses and conversations

• Adjust messaging based on results



Booking Pipeline Management



• Maintain CRM or tracking sheet

• Track stage status from prospect ? booked ? completed

• Flag hot leads and urgent replies

• Prepare summaries before calls or negotiations



Positioning Intelligence



• Identify which stages are most aligned with brand growth

• Spot partnership or collaboration opportunities

• Recommend outreach angles

• Track which messaging converts best



WHO THIS IS FOR



You should apply if you:



• Have booked guests, speakers, or clients before

• Are comfortable initiating conversations with strangers

• Can write concise, persuasive outreach messages

• Think in pipelines and conversion rates

• Are organized and detail oriented

• Move fast and communicate clearly

• Follow up without being reminded



Bonus if you:

• Have worked in PR, booking, or partnerships

• Understand speaker or creator industries

• Have CRM or lead tracking experience

• Enjoy negotiation or deal flow



STANDARDS



If hired, you will be expected to:



• Send outreach daily

• Track every conversation

• Follow up consistently

• Maintain organized records

• Bring opportunity ideas weekly

• Operate independently



This role directly impacts revenue and visibility. Precision matters.



TOOLS (NOT REQUIRED BUT HELPFUL)



Google Sheets or CRM tools

 platforms

LinkedIn

Research tools

Calendar scheduling systems



Tools can be learned. Initiative cannot.



REQUIRED SKILL TEST (MANDATORY)



To be considered, complete this task.



Scenario



You are tasked with booking me for speaking engagements and podcast interviews that attract high-level speakers, coaches, and creators.



Submit the Following



1. Opportunity Targeting

List 5 specific stages, podcasts, or events you would pitch first and explain why.



2. Outreach Message

Write one personalized pitch
 you would send to a host or event organizer.



3. Follow-Up Strategy

Outline your follow-up timeline and messaging approach.



4. Prioritization Logic

Explain how you d
 which opportunities are worth pursuing versus ignoring.



Submission Format



Provide answers as a Google Doc or PDF link.



Applications without this task will not be reviewed.



HOW TO APPLY



 subject line:



Booking Operator Application – [Your Name]



Include:



Short intro



Relevant experience



Example outreach message you’ve written before



Completed skill test



Your rate



Incomplete applications will not be reviewed.



FINAL NOTE



This role can become long-term and high leverage for the right person. If you want a position where your work directly creates opportunities, visibility, and bookings, this is that role.



If you want a passive assistant position, this is not.

title: Client Care Coordinator
description:
Looking for long-term employment?  That's exactly what we're offering...



We're an entrepreneurial bankruptcy firm that’s experiencing continued aggressive growth and we're in need of assistance with file management, client portal management, and engaging in regular
 communication.



You'll hit the ground running quickly and your responsibilities will include:

- Client portal management: you will be responsible for monitoring client's progress in their portals on a daily basis, and this will involve checking task completion, file management, and communicating with clients in the portal.  You will manage between 60 to 100 client portals at any given time.

- File management: you will be responsible for ensuring that all client documents are saved in the correct folders with the correct names.  This will require checking multiple locations daily for new documents and promptly ensuring they're saved in the correct location.

-
 communication: you will provide regular, weekly updates to clients recapping the progress they've made during the week and highlighting next steps.  You will be responsible for
ing clients who have stopped progressing or stopped paying to try to recapture their attention and get them back on track.  You must be prepared to stay completely up to date on all
s and respond to all inbound
s you receive daily

Status tracking: you will track the status of all assigned clients as they progress through various phases while they're assigned to you.  This requires constant attention and must be done carefully.



The ideal candidate will be resourceful, take initiative, be very detail oriented and highly organized.  You should have a customer service background and be ready to join an engaged team.



You must also be able to adapt quickly to change and correctly reassess priorities as new tasks are added.  



Our team is entirely virtual and we regularly chat with each other throughout the day.  We're very supportive and we all love to learn and share what we know.  If you're excited to be part of a team that loves to work hard and succeed together, there will be room for training and development as we continue growing.

title: Instagram DM Sales Closer (Christian Apparel Brand)
description:
Love of God is a rapidly growing Christian clothing brand built on impact, excellence, and authenticity. We’re not just selling apparel — we’re building a movement rooted in faith, depth, and real connection.



We’re looking for a high-performing DM Sales Closer who knows how to build genuine relationships through Instagram and
 messaging — and turn conversations into customers.



This is not entry-level support.



This is relationship-driven sales.



The Role



You will manage conversations through Instagram and
 
 using Meta Business Suite.



Your mission:



• Build trust

• Create real connection

• Handle objections confidently

• Guide conversations toward a natural close



This starts as a part-time position (10–20 hours per week) with room to grow as revenue scales.



What You’ll Be Responsible For



• Responding quickly and professionally to inbound DMs

• Starting conversations with warm followers when appropriate

• Building genuine rapport (no robotic copy-paste responses)

• Answering product questions clearly and confidently

• Handling objections like “It’s too expensive” or “I’ll think about it”

• Following up with warm leads who haven’t purchased

• Tracking conversations and sales generated

• Increasing overall DM conversion rates



Requirements



You must have:



• Excellent written English (natural, conversational tone)

• Proven sales experience (chat or call closing preferred)

• Customer support experience

• Strong emotional intelligence

• Confidence in persuasion without being aggressive

• Reliable internet connection

• Availability that overlaps with U.S. daytime hours



Bonus points if you:



• Have worked with eCommerce brands

• Understand Instagram culture and buyer psychology

• Have experience inside Meta Business Suite

• Have worked in commission-based roles



Compensation



This is a performance-based role.



• Base Pay: $4–$5 per hour (based on experience)

• Commission: 8–10% of sales generated from your tracked conversations



Hours will begin at 10–20 per week and expand as traffic and sales grow.



High performers will earn increased commission and expanded responsibility.



Growth Path



Top performers can grow into:



• Lead DM Closer

• Sales Team Manager

• Community Growth Lead



We reward performance — not tenure.



How to Apply



Please answer the following:



What sales experience do you have?



Have you ever closed a sale through chat? Describe your process.



How would you respond to:

• “I love it, but it’s too expensive.”

• “I’ll think about it.”

title: Doc Drawer (US Mortgage Company | Full-Time | Night Shift | Remote)
description:
Work Setup: 100% Remote (Work From Home)

Schedule: Monday to Friday | Night Shift (U.S. Pacific Time)

Employment Type: Full-Time | Long-Term Position



About the Role



We are a U.S.-based mortgage company looking for a Doc Drawer to join our growing operations team.



Your main responsibility is to prepare and generate accurate loan documents before closing. This is a critical position — errors in documentation can delay loan closings, so we are looking for someone who is highly detail-oriented and reliable.



If you are organized, focused, and serious about building a long-term career in the U.S. mortgage industry, this role is for you.



Fresh graduates are welcome to apply. Applicants with 1–2 years of U.S. mortgage experience are strongly preferred.



Training will be provided to the right candidate.



Key Responsibilities:

> Prepare and generate initial and closing loan documents

> Review loan approvals prior to document generation

> Verify borrower information, loan terms, fees, and rates

> Ensure documents meet compliance and investor guidelines

> Coordinate with processors, underwriters, and closing team

> Maintain internal tracking and documentation accuracy

> Ensure loan packages are complete before release



Qualifications

> Extremely detail-oriented (this is non-negotiable)

> Strong organizational and time management skills

> Good written English communication

> Basic to intermediate skills in Google Workspace or Microsoft Office

> Stable internet connection and quiet home workspace

> Willing to work night shift (PST schedule)

> Able to work independently without constant supervision



Preferred but Not Required

> Experience in U.S. mortgage (doc drawing, processing, closing, underwriting)

> Familiarity with mortgage disclosures and closing documents

> Experience working in a remote setup



What We Offer

> Competitive monthly salary (based on experience)

> Stable, long-term position

> Monday–Friday work only (Weekends off)

> Growth opportunity in the U.S. mortgage industry

> Professional and supportive work environment



>> IMPORTANT APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS (READ CAREFULLY)



To be considered:

1. Send your application through OnlineJobs.ph

2. Include a DIRECT LINK to your resume (Google Drive / OneDrive / Dropbox)

3. Make sure the link is set to “Anyone with the link can view”

Applications without a resume link

Applications without the keyword “DOCREADY”

We only review applicants who follow instructions. Attention to detail starts with your application.

Help improve internal policies, checklists, and workflows for the disclosure process.

Strong written and verbal communication skills.

This position requires a keen eye for detail, strong practical judgment, problem-solving abilities, excellent communication skills, and a methodical approach to our link-building efforts.

title: Sound Designer
description:
- Sound Designer -



Location: Remote (Philippines) / Project-Based

Duration: 4 Months

Level: Mid to Senior



About SS Production:

    SS Production is an audio house dedicated to crafting world-class auditory experiences for the global gaming industry. Our team has contributed to AAA titles, including Hitman, New World, and Star Wars. We are looking for a specialist who shares our passion for technical excellence and narrative immersion.



Role Overview:

    We are seeking a high-caliber Contract Sound Designer to craft world-class audio assets and manage narrative clarity through expert dialogue editing. You will be responsible for creating the "sonic weight" of the game—ensuring every sound effect is impactful and every line of dialogue is crystal clear within a complex acoustic environment.



Key Responsibilities:

• Asset Creation: Design and process original SFX (combat, movement, UI, and environmental) that meet AAA quality bars for texture, frequency balance, and dynamic range.

• Dialogue Editing: Perform surgical editing on raw voiceover (VO) files. This includes noise reduction (clicks, breaths, room tone), consistent leveling, and creative processing (e.g., world-izing, radio filters, or creature DSP).

• Cinematic Audio Design: Design linear audio for cutscenes and scripted sequences, focusing on emotional impact and narrative flow.

• Pipeline Discipline: Maintain rigorous naming conventions and metadata standards to ensure seamless hand-offs to the implementation team.





Required Skills & Qualifications:

• DAW Proficiency: Must be proficient in at least one of the following DAWs:

      - Reaper

      - Cubase / Nuendo

      - Pro Tools

• Audio Restoration: Knowledge of restoration suites (e.g., iZotope RX) for cleaning and polishing dialogue.



Preferred Skills:

• Middleware Implementation: Experience in Wwise or FMOD.

• Engine Integration: Experience working within Unreal Engine (Audio Blueprints/MetaSounds) or Unity.



Application Requirements:

1. Resume: Highlighting past experience in games, film, or any type of media.

2. Showreel: A link to your work.

You'll be joining a collaborative, fast-moving team where great design meets real impact—and where the work you create reaches millions of families at some of life's most meaningful moments.

We're looking for a Paid Social Designer who can turn ideas, insights, and briefs into scroll-stopping ad creatives. You'll work closely with marketers and strategists to design high-performing visuals for paid social and digital campaigns while maintaining strong brand consistency.



This role sits at the intersection of creative + performance—you'll design not just what looks good, but what converts.





What You'll Do



Design static, carousel, and motion ad creatives for platforms such as Paid Social (Meta, Pinterest, TikTok, AppLovin, Youtube Ads),
/SMS

Translate creative briefs, hooks, and messaging into visually compelling content

Create multiple variations of concepts for structured A/B testing

Adapt creative to platform best practices safe zones, pacing, aspect ratios, sound/music

Partner with the growth marketing team to iterate on creatives based on performance (CTR, thumb-stop rate, conversions, etc.)

Collaborate cross functionally to share insights on customers through ad performance

Maintain brand guidelines while exploring new visual angles and formats

Prepare, organize, and deliver final assets for launch and handoff

What We're Looking For



2+ years of experience (agency or in-house) designing static content for paid social and paid
 campaigns

Strong proficiency in design and video editing tools such as Figma, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, CapCut, or similar

Solid understanding of layout, typography, color, and visual hierarchy and ability to design content with ad performance in mind,, not just aesthetics

Nice to Have

title: Executive Assistant to the CEO with Project Management Experience
description:
Job Title: Executive Assistant to the CEO with Project Management Experience



Salary: $600–$900 per month

Location: Remote (Full-time, CST Hours)

Start Date: Immediate



About the Role:

We are seeking a high-caliber Executive Virtual Assistant to support a fast-moving founder across multiple personal and professional initiatives. This role blends project coordination, information management, research, and executive support.



The ideal candidate is a jack of all trades with strong judgment, excellent communication, and comfort working across many types of projects. Prior experience in every task is not required—transferable skills, adaptability, and reliability matter more than a perfect resume.



What You’ll Work On:

Organizing and maintaining project materials, documents, and reference files

Managing meeting transcripts, notes, and follow-ups

Capturing ideas, links, and voice notes, and turning them into organized, usable records

Supporting multiple projects by tracking context, open items, and next steps

Conducting research and organizing data for future reference

Assisting with personal knowledge management and learning materials

Providing general executive support to help projects move forward smoothly

This role requires comfort jumping between different types of work while keeping everything organized and accessible.



Key Skills & Attributes:

Core Skills:

Excellent written and verbal communication

Strong organizational and documentation skills

High attention to detail and follow-through

Ability to manage multiple priorities and shifting requests

Comfort working with incomplete or ambiguous instructions



Technical & Research Skills (Non-Coding):

Strong proficiency with Google Drive, Docs, and Sheets

Comfortable learning and using new tools and software

Experience with research, data organization, and summarization

Familiarity with transcription tools, AI tools, or knowledge-management systems is a plus



Personal Traits:

Proactive and dependable

Calm under pressure and ambiguity

Discreet and trustworthy with sensitive information

Systems-oriented thinker who enjoys creating order



Who This Role Is For:



Someone who enjoys variety and problem-solving

Thinks in systems, not just tasks

Wants to grow into a high-impact assistant role

Can support both personal and professional workflows



Who This Role Is Not For:

Someone seeking repetitive, narrowly defined work

Someone is uncomfortable with changing priorities

Someone who requires constant step-by-step direction



Why Join:

Work closely with a founder on diverse projects

Gain exposure to high-level thinking and execution

Build skills that translate to senior executive support roles

Long-term growth potential for the right candidate



How to Apply:

Only candidates who complete the application form will be considered:




Please make sure your responses reflect your experience and suitability for this role.

title: SEO Manager
description:
A growing and successful marketing agency is looking to add an SEO leader to our amazing staff! We are looking for a brilliant, organized individual who has the aptitude to perform logic-based and detail-oriented tasks at a reasonable pace, understands the value of hard work, and wants to grow with the company.  Please watch this video before applying: 



Role Purpose

The SEO Manager is responsible for developing strategy, executing and overseeing on page, off page and technical SEO, website project coordination, and performance monitoring across a multi-client portfolio. This role is a critical operational seat within the agency and requires ownership, accuracy, and the ability to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously. This role operates under the strategic direction of the Director of Operations and is responsible for executing within established SEO frameworks, processes, and performance standards. Strategic oversight and final authority remain with the Director of Operations.



Why This Role Matters

Search performance directly impacts client retention, agency reputation, and growth.



This position exists to:

Protect the technical integrity of client websites

Ensure SEO deliverables are executed properly

Maintain workflow and deadlines

Identify opportunities for ranking and traffic growth

Support scalable operations as the agency grows

Importance in this role is earned through consistency, results, and independent ownership.



Core Responsibilities

SEO Planning Execution & Auditing

Run and interpret audits (Ahrefs, Search Atlas, Screaming Frog, LinkBoss)

Pull and analyze data from GSC

Perform citation audits

Evaluate service & geo targeting accuracy

Identify missing content opportunities

Support content silo strategy

Oversee indexing, sitemap integrity, and crawl health

Manage GA4, GTM, and conversion tracking setup

Monitor for penalties, crashes, or indexing issues

Assisting with link building

Expectation:  You are responsible for understanding what the data means and what action should follow.



Website & Content Publishing Project Management

Coordinate new website builds from SEO perspective

Verify technical work completion

Ensure plugins, backups, and security are maintained

Conduct QA before publishing

Support disaster recovery when needed

Expectation:  Nothing goes live without review and confirmation.



Workflow Management

Prioritize SEO tasks across multiple clients

Review staff task completion

Enforce deadlines

QA all deliverables

Monitor SEO-related client communications

Upload client assets when needed

Expectation: You will manage multiple campaigns simultaneously and maintain organization without constant oversight.



Content & Optimization Oversight

Oversee keyword-driven content creation (AI-assisted)

Ensure content aligns with service and geo strategy

Review before publishing

Expectation:  Content must be strategic, not filler.



Performance Standards

This role requires:

Comfortably managing multiple client accounts at once

Ability to learn quickly and apply feedback

Professional communication

Strong attention to detail

Willingness to operate within established processes

Accountability for mistakes and corrections



Growth Path

As proficiency, independence, and results improve, expanded responsibility may include:

Greater strategic input

Increased client-facing involvement

Broader operational exposure

Expanded responsibility, including increased client-facing exposure or operational involvement, is earned through consistent performance, independent decision-making, and demonstrated strategic comprehension.



This role must:

Deliver measurable impact

Operate efficiently

Align with leadership structure

Support scalable growth

If the role does not align with skill set or performance expectations, we will reassess fit.



Cross-Functional & Operational Support

In addition to core SEO responsibilities, this role provides limited cross-functional support to ensure operational continuity across the agency.



Responsibilities will also likely include:

Assisting with Canva-based creative assets for Google Business Profile posts and light social media initiatives

Supporting setup and scheduling within the approved posting software

Serving as backup support for SEM vendor monitoring and reporting oversight when needed

Other projects as assigned

Expectation: These responsibilities are supportive in nature and secondary to core SEO performance ownership.



To apply for the position, please include the word “unicorn” in the title of your application. Additionally, include a screenshot of your IQ test results from the Culture Fair IQ Test by Psychology Today (simply search for”Culture Fair IQ Test Psychology Today” and click the first link to take the test; it’s free).



Please be aware that there will be a trial interview following the initial interview process.

title: Virtual Assistant / Customer Service Representative (Healthcare Practice)
description:
Virtual Assistant / Customer Service Representative (Healthcare Practice)



???? IMPORTANT: To be considered, include the word *“Well-being”* in your application title. Applications without this will not be reviewed.



**About Us**



We are a small mental health group practice in the U.S. seeking a reliable, professional Virtual Assistant based in the Philippines to help manage our client calls and scheduling. This role is ideal for someone who is organized, detail-oriented, and comfortable working in a healthcare setting.



**Responsibilities:**



* Answer incoming calls and return missed calls professionally

* Schedule, reschedule, and manage appointments for multiple therapists

* Call clients 24 hours before appointments to remind them of sessions and no-show fees

* Verify client insurance information and enter clients into our online portal

*
 the supervisor details of all new clients

* Send end-of-day reports with all appointment confirmations

* Perform additional administrative tasks as assigned



**Requirements:**



* Fluent or near-fluent spoken and written English (clear phone communication is required)

* Prior experience in customer service, call handling, or virtual assistance

* Strong organizational and multitasking skills

* Reliable internet connection and quiet workspace

* Familiarity with scheduling systems and basic tech tools (training provided)

* Professional, warm, and compassionate communication style (healthcare experience is a plus)



**Schedule:**



**Monday–Friday, 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (New York Time)**



**Compensation:**



**$350–$400 USD per month** (depending on experience and performance)



**How to Apply:**



Please submit:



1. A brief introduction about yourself

2. Your relevant experience

3. Your English proficiency level

4. Your internet speed and workspace setup

5. The code word **“Well-being”** in your application title

title: Product Analytics Manager (Amplitude)
description:
We’re a growing digital business looking for an experienced Amplitude analytics specialist to take day-to-day ownership of our product analytics. We already have a structured tracking setup and dedicated CRO team. Your role will be to maintain, improve, and monitor our Amplitude implementation - ensuring experiments are set up correctly, data is accurate, and performance issues are identified early. This is a long-term, stable remote role with real ownership.



What You’ll Do

- Own and manage our Amplitude workspace

- Maintain and enforce tracking plans

- Set up and validate A/B tests designed by our CRO team

- Ensure experiments are tracking correctly before and after launch

- Build and maintain dashboards used across the business

- Monitor traffic and conversion performance across global markets

- Analyse performance by country, device, browser and user type

- Spot anomalies, tracking issues or revenue-impacting problems

- Work closely with product and developers to maintain clean event data



What We’re Looking For

- Minimum 1 year hands-on experience using Amplitude

- Experience setting up Amplitude for websites or products

- Experience creating dashboards and reports

- Experience supporting or implementing A/B tests

- Strong attention to detail

- Comfortable working independently

- Fluent English (written and spoken)

- Available to work full UK business hours



About Us

- Fully remote team

- Small, fast-moving digital business

- Multiple global websites and products



What We Offer

- Competitive salary including 13th month pay

- Paid holiday including all local holidays

- Stable long-term job

- Opportunity to grow with the company



How to Apply

Alongside your CV, please include:

- A brief example of an Amplitude project you’ve worked on

- A dashboard you’ve created (screenshots welcome)

title: Social Media & Growth Associate
description:
Job Title: Social Media & Growth Associate (Beauty Startup – Remote)



Hi! I’m the founder of a fast-growing luxury self-tan/skincare brand. I currently run everything myself and I’m looking for someone smart, proactive, and growth-focused to help scale our Instagram and TikTok presence and increase sales.

This is NOT just a posting job. I’m looking for someone who understands short-form video, social growth, and conversion. 

Responsibilities:

• Edit Reels and TikToks (short-form beauty content)

• Repurpose content across Instagram and TikTok

• Write engaging, sales-focused captions

• Post daily on instagram, tiktok

• Help brainstorm viral hooks

• Track what performs and suggest improvements

• Highlight customer testimonials & before/afters

• Assist with basic sales optimization ideas



Ideal Candidate:

• Experience managing or growing beauty/skincare brands

• Strong understanding of Instagram & TikTok algorithms

• Skilled in short-form video editing

Bonus:

• Experience in CapCut/Canva

This role can start part-time and grow into full-time.



Please include:

Your Portfolio

Examples of beauty brands you've worked on

Reels/TikToks you've edited

Results you've helped achieve

Sales you have driven

title: Wholesale Real Estate Cold Caller
description:
Experienced Real Estate Cold Caller (U.S. Market)



We are a real estate investment company based in Middle Tennessee, USA, looking for an experienced cold caller to contact property owners and identify potential home sellers.



This is NOT a beginner position. You must have prior U.S. real estate cold calling experience.



What You Will Do:



-Call property owners using a multi-line dialer (Batch Dialer)



-Speak with homeowners about selling their property



-Identify motivated sellers



-Accurately tag and disposition calls



-Set up qualified leads for our acquisitions team



Requirements:



-Previous U.S. real estate cold calling experience (required)



-Experience using multi-line dialers (Mojo, Batch, ReadyMode, etc.)



-Comfortable making 1,000+ dials per day



-Able to generate 2–4 qualified leads per day



-Strong, clear English communication skills



-Reliable internet connection and quiet workspace



-Professional and coachable attitude



Schedule:



-40 hours per week



-U.S. Central Time (CST)



-Monday–Friday (Saturday optional)



Compensation:



-Hourly pay (based on experience)



-Performance bonuses for closed deals



To Apply:



Please complete the application form below and upload a 60-second voice recording introducing yourself as if you are calling a homeowner about selling their property.



Only applicants who complete the form will be considered.

title: Technical Support Specialist (Open to Fresh Graduates)
description:
***APPLICATIONS FROM FRESH IT OR COMPUTER SCIENCE GRADUATES WITH BASIC CODING KNOWLEDGE WILL BE GIVEN PRIORITY***



APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS:

1. Add “TECHNICAL” to your subject line when applying

2. Submit a short cover letter along with a link to your CV/Resume



***WE WILL ONLY REVIEW APPLICATIONS THAT INCLUDE A CV/RESUME***



We’re adding a Technical Support Specialist to our remote team to help support our internal tools and user environment. This role focuses on troubleshooting issues, answering technical questions, and providing clear, practical guidance while maintaining a professional and helpful approach.



You’ll work closely with our team to ensure requests are handled efficiently and users receive reliable support. Training and guidance will be provided as you grow into the role.



What You’ll Work On:

Respond to incoming support requests through our internal channels



Troubleshoot technical concerns and provide clear solutions



Understand each user’s situation to deliver thoughtful and relevant support



Create and manage Jira tickets, escalating issues internally when needed



Follow established workflows and collaborate with the team to maintain consistent service quality



Who this Role is For: 

Excellent English communication skills — verbal, written, and reading



IT or Computer Science background, or basic familiarity with coding (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, or similar)



Detail-oriented, proactive, and comfortable learning in a fast-moving environment



Strong research and problem-solving skills



Customer support experience is helpful but not required



Familiarity with CRM or ticketing tools is an advantage



Hours:

Full-time remote role



8 hours per day, 5 days per week



Additional workdays may occasionally be requested

title: Aurora to generate 3D site visuals
description:
I am looking for a "VA on steroids" who can create high-end technical infrastructure proposals. My previous designer used Aurora to generate 3D site visuals and bird’s-eye parcel views, and I need someone who can match that exact technical capability.



The Job:



3D Site Visuals: You must be able to use Aurora (or high-end 3D rendering software) to create clean, professional bird’s-eye views of infrastructure sites.



Proposal Layout: Take those renderings and put them into a "Golden Era" Canva layout that looks like a high-end investment prospectus.



Financials: Turn project budgets and ROI data into clean, professional tables (matching the style of my previous workforce housing proposals).



Reliability: I move fast and work on sensitive projects. No ghosting.



Requirements:



Software: Must be proficient in Aurora (or similar site-modeling software) and Canva.



Portfolio: You MUST show examples of 3D site renderings/proposals you have built.



Communication: Quick responses are a must.



Subject Line: Use the word "BRIDGE" in your application.

title: Content Feedback Manager (Giving Feedback): $1,000–$1,200 USD START RATE
description:
Start rate: $800 a month + performance-based bonuses (TOTAL: $1,000–$1,200 a month)



Paid every two weeks via Wise.



ABOUT US







Young Publisher is an international digital marketing company working with content creators and online brands.



BENEFITS

- Full-time position: 8 hours daily, Monday-Friday; 40 hours a week

- Flexible schedule: Choose your own hours, as long as you show up for the daily meeting (MANDATORY)

- Stable income: Long-term role with regular, on-time payments

- Supportive team: Collaborative environment without micromanagement

- Growth path: Opportunities to increase responsibilities and earnings

- 100% remote: Work-from-home setup



TASKS



- Content & Client Feedback

- Review 30-60 short-form client videos (Instagram Reels, TikTok, YouTube Shorts) per day in our Slack feedback channel -before they are published

- Give constructive, actionable feedback on hooks (verbal/headline/visual), scripting, pacing, editing, and CTA, making sure each client knows exactly how to improve

- Cross-reference each piece of content with client niche, experience, and goals as outlined in their files

- Review previous feedback to ensure consistency and avoid contradictions

- Quality-control content ideas created by our Content Research Experts before delivery to the client, ensuring fit with niche, experience, and likely performance

- Oversee workload balance among Content Research Experts and make sure no one on the team is overloaded or underutilized

- Respond to client questions or tech issues in Slack within 24 hours

- Be tough but fair—only approve content that meets quality standards



Progress Tracking



- Complete daily End-of-Day (EOD) reports

- Attend daily tea
eting (mandatory, 3pm CET)

- Keep internal feedback and client progress records up to date



REQUIREMENTS (MUST-HAVE)

- C1+ English (written), with perfect grammar and clear, professional responses

- Significant experience creating or reviewing short-form content for Instagram Reels, TikTok, or YouTube Shorts

- Organized and detail-oriented

- Reliable internet and a quiet, professional home workspace

- Accountability mindset and deadline commitment

- Long-term commitment, eager to master a workflow and have direct impact on client success



IMPORTANT



- When recording a Loom video as part of your application:

- Camera must show your FACE & SCREEN

- Treat it as a LIVE interview with the Hiring Manager

- Have a professional background

- Have clear audio

- Wear business-casual attire



BONUS SKILLS (NOT REQUIRED)



- Experience supporting creators and social media beginners, especially ages 45+

- Familiarity with AI tools like ChatGPT, CapCut, etc.

- Strong understanding of trends/strategy for Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts



WHY JOIN US?



- Start rate: $800 a month + performance-based bonuses (TOTAL: $1,000–$1,200 a month once trained)

Note: Senior CFMs earn $1,500+ after 6–12 months.

- Performance bonuses: Up to $400+ additional monthly based on:

- Quality and clarity of feedback

- Task completion and consistency

- Teamwork and responsibility

- Payments: Twice per month via Wise, direct to your bank

- Tools access: All tools/software fully covered

- Work-life balance: No graveyard shifts

- Professional growth: Frequent feedback and advanced training



HOW TO APPLY



1: Message us on OnlineJobs.ph with "CFM" as the message title



2: Include ONLY the following in your message:



#1: Your CV.

#2: Your years of experience with short-form content.

#3: Your years of experience with content feedback or coaching.

#4: One sentence on why you're a good fit for this role.

#5: Your portfolio (including examples of your feedback or video/content work).



Note: Messages that do not follow this format will NOT be reviewed.



P.S. Young Publisher is the recruitment company. Successful candidates will work under Social Influence Consulting LLC.

title: Data Analyst & Automation Specialist
description:
Data Analyst & Automation Specialist (Remote)

Do you like working from home?

Hate commuting?

Love turning messy data into clean, automated reports?



We’re looking for someone who can analyze data, spot trends, and automate reporting so leadership can review the previous day’s numbers quickly and clearly. If you’ve ever looked at a manual report and thought “This should be automated…” — this role is for you.



What you’ll do:

- Automate reports (daily / weekly / monthly)

- Eliminate manual exports

- Build simple, clean dashboards

- Review previous-day data with leadership

- Can explain numbers in plain English

100% Remote | Real Impact | Growth Opportunity

If you love data, automation, and solving real problems — we want to hear from you.



How to Apply:

Please send your resume. Include "Data Analysis & Automation" in the subject line. Only candidates who send their resume will be considered.

title: Technical Operations Builder
description:
(Automation & Systems Integrator)



We are looking for a highly technical, execution-focused operator who loves building systems.



This is not a traditional virtual assistant role. This is a hands-on technical execution position for someone who enjoys learning new tools, wiring systems together, troubleshooting issues, and making ideas actually work.



You will work directly with the founder to implement and maintain operational systems across the company. The founder engineers the plans. You build, connect, test, document, and improve it.



If you wait for step-by-step instructions, this role is not for you.

If you enjoy figuring things out and making systems run smoothly, you’ll thrive here.



What You’ll Do



Build and maintain automations using tools like Zapier

Create and manage Mailchimp automations and workflows

Configure WordPress plugins and forms

Connect tools together (forms ? CRM ? task boards ?
/text systems)

Troubleshoot when systems break and fix issues quickly

Document systems clearly so others can run them

Learn new tools rapidly and implement them with minimal guidance

Take ownership of technical execution on projects



When a project is launched, you will have your steps and responsibilities alongside the founder. If something needs to be built, tested, or made functional, you are the one who makes it happen.



Required Skills & Experience



Strong comfort with learning and navigating new software independently

Experience with automation tools (Zapier or similar)

Experience with Mailchimp (especially automations)

Experience working inside WordPress

Strong understanding of Google Workspace

Experience building or maintaining operational systems

Ability to troubleshoot logically and escalate with clear documentation



You Might Be a Good Fit If



You enjoy clicking through tools until you understand them

You’ve taught yourself software without formal training

You think in workflows and systems

You get satisfaction from fixing broken processes

You are calm when something breaks and methodical in solving it

You prefer building over attending meetings



You Are Not a Good Fit If



You need detailed step-by-step instructions to get started

You prefer purely administrative work

You avoid technical problems

You get overwhelmed by new software environments

You wait for direction instead of taking initiative



Tools You Will Likely Use



Zapier

Mailchimp

WordPress & WPForms

Trello

Google Workspace

Text messaging automation systems

Additional tools as we grow



Availability



Must be available during Central Time working hours and responsive during core hours.



Compensation



$303/week USD (full-time)



This role is ideal for someone who wants to grow into a long-term technical operations leader inside a company.



Application Instructions



Please include:



Your resume

A short 2–3 minute voice or video recording explaining:



A system or automation you built and How you approach troubleshooting when something breaks



A written answer to this question:



“Explain how you would build a workflow where a form submission triggers a Trello card, sends an
 confirmation, and adds the contact to a Mailchimp automation.”



Applications without all three will not be considered.

title: WordPress / WooCommerce Developer (Bricks Builder Expert)
description:
About Us-

We are a fast-growing eCommerce company looking for a highly skilled, detail-oriented WordPress developer who can step in immediately and take ownership of our website. We offer a very large inventory with over 20,000 products. This requires very strategic page layouts and product filtering. We need a candidate that can jump in and handle our current issues with speed and extreme efficiency. We are working on a very tight timeline.



This position will be a tiered pay upon task completion. Phase 1 (pay out) - Phase 2 (pay out)



Our site is built on WordPress with WooCommerce and Bricks Builder. We need someone experienced, confident, and capable of solving complex issues quickly. This is not an entry-level role.

We are looking for a strong, all-around web professional who can handle both technical development and strategic marketing implementation.



Responsibilities-

Build new pages using Bricks Builder

Resolve WooCommerce product filtering issues

Fix website bugs and technical errors

Optimize site speed and overall performance

Perform ongoing website maintenance

Set up and optimize
 marketing systems

Implement eCommerce marketing and sales strategies

Improve conversion rates

Manage and troubleshoot AWS hosting

Handle general website troubleshooting and optimization



Required Skills & Experience-

Strong expertise in WordPress

Advanced experience with WooCommerce

Advanced experience with Bricks Builder

Strong understanding of website speed optimization (Core Web Vitals, caching, etc.)

Experience with
 marketing integrations

Solid understanding of eCommerce UX and conversion strategies

AWS hosting knowledge (server setup, troubleshooting, performance optimization)

Ability to debug and solve issues independently

Strong communication skills

Ability to work quickly under tight deadlines

Highly detail-oriented and organized



What We’re Looking For-

A problem-solver who takes initiative

title: Online Math/Science Teacher(Near-Native Accent)
description:
About Pomelo Academy

Pomelo Academy is an innovative online international school dedicated to delivering high-quality education to students worldwide. We provide a dynamic and engaging learning environment, catering to individualized instruction that transcends geographical boundaries.



Job Description

We are seeking passionate and experienced Near-Native English-speaking Online K-12 Math and/or Science Teachers with verifiable teaching certifications. The ideal candidates will have strong academic backgrounds in Mathematics and/or Science, experience teaching young learners (ages 5–18), and a commitment to creating a supportive, inquiry-based, and engaging online learning environment.



Responsibilities



Deliver interactive and engaging Math and/or Science lessons to individuals and small groups of 2–6 students aged 5–18.

Teach using internationally recognized curricula such as A Closer Look, Glencoe Science, Pearson Interactive Science, NGSS-aligned resources, Singapore Math, or IB/AP/A Level Math programs.

Create age-appropriate lesson plans focused on conceptual understanding, inquiry, problem-solving, and real-world applications.

Incorporate visuals, multimedia, and hands-on virtual activities to make abstract concepts accessible and engaging.

Monitor student progress and provide timely feedback to students and parents.

Foster curiosity, discussion, and active learning in a safe and supportive space.



Qualifications



Professional teacher with at least 2 years of teaching experience (Kindergarten–Grade 12).

Must hold a valid teaching license/certification (e.g., Teaching License, State Certification). TESOL/TEFL is a plus.

Near-native English accent with excellent spoken and written communication skills.

Strong academic background in Mathematics and/or Science (Biology, Physics, Chemistry, General Science).

Experience teaching in public/international schools or reputable online platforms.

Familiarity with inquiry-based and/or interdisciplinary approaches (e.g., STEM/STEAM).

Comfortable working between 07:00–22:00 (Weekdays) and 9:00–22:00 (Weekends), GMT+8.

Proficiency with digital platforms such as ClassIn, Microsoft Office, and other educational technologies.

Must have a stable and fast internet connection and a PC/laptop with at least Windows 10 or Mac OS Catalina.



Benefits



Flexible working hours.

Opportunity to teach using globally respected Math and Science curricula.

Be part of an international, passionate team of educators.

Access to training and professional development.

Regular enrollment model (not a booking system), ensuring schedule stability and consistency

title: Corporate Leasing Executive
description:
This job position is BASED IN SINGAPORE




.sg



Start Something Purposeful.



At Acuvest Group, we believe in creating concepts that allow people, business and purpose to come together and thrive. We’re a privately owned real estate group dedicated to real estate concepts for industrial and commercial spaces. We are both owners of industrial properties, commercial shophouses and spaces, as well as operators of business models and concepts such as urbanspace self storage, Urbanpod workspace etc. 



We actively invest to expand our asset portfolio and grow our industrial and shophouse asset management capabilities and offerings.  



We’re looking for a Business Development and Sales Executive to bring our asset investment and management services to our clients, partners and stakeholders. 



Your Mission 



To be part of the team to grow our asset portfolio and drive performance through innovations and teamwork. 



This is a full-stack business development and sales role with plenty of room to use your skillsets in sales, strategy, innovation and execution. You’ll work with a motivated team and collaborate closely with other departments. You will report to the Business Development / Sales Director and play a critical role in the company’s performance. 



Why Join us :



- Mentored by management of a company with decades of experience in investment management, property management, development, and self-storage solutions across Singapore and the region. We combine strategic insight with innovation, offering real opportunities to grow and make an impact across a diversified real estate portfolio.



- Build an Elite Network: Connect directly with a high-value network of Corporate and SME business leaders / decision-makers, building a powerful network for your long-term career success.



- Thrive in a High-Growth Self-Storage Sector. Our self-storage business, Co-working business space, E-commerce fulfilment hubs, serve both individual and corporate clients with flexible space solutions in a fast-rising market. You’ll be at the forefront of lead generation, networking, and deal closing—driving measurable results in an expanding industry.



- Collaborative Culture. Real Career Progression. Work with experienced professionals across property and investment teams, gain exposure to full deal cycles, build strong client relationships, and accelerate your career in sales and business development at Acuvest.



Full job description : What you will be doing



Property Leasing :



- Develop and implement leasing strategies and initiatives to maximize occupancy, rental income, and tenant satisfaction



- Identify leasing opportunities and prospective tenants that align with the positioning and target market of each property, and develop relationships with tenants and prospective tenants.



- Negotiate lease agreements, including terms and conditions, rental rates, lease incentives, and lease renewals, and ensure compliance with company policies and industry standards.



- Collaborate with property management teams to conduct market research and analysis, assess competitive landscape, and identify trends and opportunities in the property market.



- Develop and maintain leasing budgets, forecasts, and reports, and track leasing activity, occupancy rates, and financial performance against targets and benchmarks.



- Manage tenant relations and communication, including addressing tenant inquiries, resolving disputes, and ensuring tenant compliance with lease terms and property rules and regulations.



- Represent the company at industry events, trade shows, and networking opportunities to promote our properties and attract potential tenants and partners.



Self storage sales :



- Work closely self storage sales team and management on drive the sales and occupancy of our self storage business.



Property Investment :



- Work closely with Management team to develop business opportunities for new property investment and development projects on a project basis.



- Unlock Potential: Identify underutilized properties and devise creative strategies to maximize their value and utility



Requirements : Who we are looking for.



- Strong business acumen and a strategic mindset. Enterprenuerial mindset



- An outgoing, optimistic personality with exceptional interpersonal skills. Strong networking and interpersonal skills.



- The ability to communicate confidently and effectively at all levels. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to build relationships and influence stakeholders at all levels.



- Minimum of 5 years of experience working experience.



- Strong understanding of leasing principles, market dynamics, and negotiation strategies in the real estate industry.



- Proven track record of successfully negotiating lease agreements, driving occupancy, and achieving leasing targets and goals.



- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to analyze market data, evaluate leasing opportunities, and make data-driven decisions.



- Results-oriented mindset with a focus on driving leasing outcomes and delivering exceptional customer service to tenants and partners.



- Ability to manage multiple projects and priorities simultaneously in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.



- An eagerness to learn and grow through hard work and dedication

Work with AI-generated content pipelines



Design blog automation workflows



Build GBP auto-posting pipelines



Structure internal linking at scale





Required



3-5+ years WordPress development



Deep understanding of local SEO structure



Experience with schema markup



Deep understanding of SEO and AEO/GEO 



Familiarity with REST APIs



Experience integrating automation tools (Make / n8n / APIs)

Must think in scalable templates



Expert in the WordPress plug-ins required for scale and automation



Familiarity with LLMs



Ability to make replicable templates for local businesses and directories



Bonus

Experience working with large-scale site duplication



Questions

title: Paid Ads Specialist (Google, Meta & Local Services Ads)
description:
We’re looking for a results-driven Paid Ads Specialist to manage and scale lead-generation campaigns across Google Ads, Meta 
 & Instagram), and Local Services Ads (LSA). This role focuses on lead quality, efficiency, and real business growth — not just traffic or vanity metrics. If you are analytical, proactive, and comfortable managing multiple client accounts, we’d love to hear from you.

3. Strong knowledge of Search campaigns, smart bidding, and keyword strategy

4. Experience with Meta audiences, testing, and scaling

5. Familiar with GA4, Google Tag Manager, and conversion tracking

6. Comfortable handling multiple client accounts

7. Data-driven and detail-oriented



Tools You’ll Use

- Google Ads, Meta Ads Manager, Local Services Ads

- CRM & call tracking tools (GoHighLevel experience is a BIG plus)



Nice to Have

Your job would be creating and recreating slide-based posts for Social Media in Canva Pro, with the help of various AI image generating models such as Seedream, Z Image, and Nano Banana.



We are looking for someone motivated, who is willing to be part of a team full of generous people striving to improve and grow together. A good level of English communication is required, as communication is a key foundation of our collaboration.



The job would be for 8 hours a day, from Monday to Sunday.



If you have Canva Pro (and experience with CapCut Pro), you have an advantage.



If you're interested, feel free to reach out to us!
